name: Poison Shot
description: Shoot an arrow that deals ${50}%  weapon damage. On hit or land, this arrow creates 3m radius poison cloud that lasts 6s. Foes entering the cloud are poisoned and take ${20}%  weapon damage per second for ${10}s. (This ability cannot headshot.)
descriptionHtml: Shoot an arrow that deals ${50}% weapon damage. On hit or land, this arrow creates 3m radius poison cloud that lasts 6s. Foes entering the cloud are poisoned and take ${20}% weapon damage per second for ${10}s. (This ability cannot headshot.)

name: Infected Arrows
description: Poison Shot's poison now does ${24}% weapon damage per second for ${10}s.
descriptionHtml: Poison Shot's poison now does ${24}% weapon damage per second for ${10}s.

name: Direct Hit
description: Direct hits against targets are more powerful and now deal ${100}% weapon damage.
descriptionHtml: Direct hits against targets are more powerful and now deal ${100}% weapon damage.

name: Evade Shot
description: Leap back 5m and shoot an arrow dealing ${90}% weapon damage to your target.
descriptionHtml: Leap back 5m and shoot an arrow dealing ${90}% weapon damage to your target.

name: Evasive Knockback
description: Evade Shot staggers and pushes the target back ${2}m.
descriptionHtml: Evade Shot <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">staggers</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">pushes</font> the target back <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}m</font>.

name: Go the Distance
description: Evade Shot grants you a ${15}% haste for ${5}s. (Haste increases movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: Evade Shot grants you a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

name: Rain of Arrows
description: Shoot a barrage of arrows that covers a ${4}m radius area and deals ${150}% weapon damage. (This ability cannot headshot.)
descriptionHtml: Shoot a barrage of arrows that covers a ${4}m radius area and deals ${150}% weapon damage. (This ability cannot headshot.)

name: Barbed Arrows
description: Rain of Arrows causes bleed, dealing ${15}% weapon damage per second for ${12}s.
descriptionHtml: Rain of Arrows causes bleed, dealing ${15}% weapon damage per second for ${12}s.

name: Hooked Arrows
description: Rain of Arrows causes a ${15}% slow for ${4}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: Rain of Arrows causes a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}% slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

name: Rending Headshot
description: Headshots inflict rend reducing target's armor by ${10}% for ${5}s.
descriptionHtml: Headshots inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">rend</font> reducing target's armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

name: Catch Me If You Can
description: If surrounded by 3 or more foes within 3m of you, gain ${20}% haste. (Haste increases movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: If surrounded by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">3</font> or more foes within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">3m</font> of you, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}% haste</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

name: Closing In
description: Hitting a foe below 50% health reduces all bow ability cooldowns by ${5}%.
descriptionHtml: Hitting a foe below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">50%</font> health reduces all bow ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font>.

name: Impale
description: If you hit a foe with 100% health, inflict a ${10}% slow for ${2}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: If you hit a foe with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">100%</font> health, inflict a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}% slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

name: Hunter's Insight
description: Hitting a foe with a debuff grants ${5} stamina.
descriptionHtml: Hitting a foe with a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font> grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}</font> stamina.

name: Dodge and Weave
description: After dodging with full stamina, gain ${10}% haste for ${2}s. (Haste increases movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: After dodging with full stamina, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

name: Archer's Speed
description: Gain ${10}% haste for ${5}s when you swap to your bow. (Haste increases movement speed.) (Cooldown ${10}s.)
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font> when you swap to your bow. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.) (Cooldown ${10}s.)</font>

name: Mark
description: Deal ${10}% more damage to foes suffering from a debuff.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> more damage to foes suffering from a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font>.

name: Battle Precision
description: Debuff durations last ${20}% longer. (Does not affect crowd control debuffs.)
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Debuff</font> durations last ${20}% longer. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Does not affect crowd control debuffs.)</font>

name: Evasive Tactics
description: Deal ${15}% more damage for ${5}s after dodging.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> more damage for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font> after dodging.

name: Rapid Shot
description:
Shoot 3 consecutive arrows.

First Arrow: ${100}% weapon damage.
Second Arrow: ${100}% weapon damage.
Third Arrow: ${125}% weapon damage.
descriptionHtml: Shoot 3 consecutive arrows. First Arrow: ${100}% weapon damage. Second Arrow: ${100}% weapon damage. Third Arrow: ${125}% weapon damage.

name: Rapid Accuracy
description: If all 3 arrows hit the same target, Rapid Shot's cooldown is reduced by ${50}%.
descriptionHtml: If all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">3</font> arrows hit the same target, Rapid Shot's cooldown is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font>.

name: Final Blow
description: The third arrow of Rapid Shot deals ${25}% extra damage.
descriptionHtml: The third arrow of Rapid Shot deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font> extra damage.

name: Penetrating Shot
description:
Shoot an arrow that deals ${150}% weapon damage and passes through targets.

This attack has a range of 100m.
descriptionHtml: Shoot an arrow that deals ${150}% weapon damage and passes through targets. This attack has a range of 100m.

name: Blood Soaked Arrow
description: Penetrating Shot deals ${10}% increased damage after each hit. (Max ${50}% damage.)
descriptionHtml: Penetrating Shot deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> increased damage after each hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${50}% damage.)</font>

name: Deep Strike
description: Penetrating Shot deals ${15}% more damage to targets ${20}m or more away.
descriptionHtml: Penetrating Shot deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> more damage to targets <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}m</font> or more away.

name: Explosive Arrow
description: Fire an arrow that deals ${50}% weapon damage on hit, then explodes on impact dealing an additional ${135}% damage to all targets within a ${2.5}m radius.
descriptionHtml: Fire an arrow that deals ${50}% weapon damage on hit, then explodes on impact dealing an additional ${135}% damage to all targets within a ${2.5}m radius.

name: Flame Arrow
description: Explosive Arrow direct hits inflict burn, dealing ${8}% weapon damage every second for ${10}s.
descriptionHtml: Explosive Arrow direct hits inflict burn, dealing ${8}% weapon damage every second for ${10}s.

name: Contained Detonation
description: Explosion damage increased to ${170}% weapon damage, but decreases the explosion radius to ${1.25}m.
descriptionHtml: Explosion damage increased to ${170}% weapon damage, but decreases the explosion radius to ${1.25}m.

name: Long Range
description: Deal ${10}% more damage to foes at least ${10}m away.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> more damage to foes at least <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}m</font> away.

name: Aim True
description: Heavy attack arrows fly faster and deal ${10}% more damage.
descriptionHtml: Heavy attack arrows <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">fly faster</font> and deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> more damage.

name: Unbreakable Focus
description: Armor is increased by ${10}% while aiming.
descriptionHtml: Armor is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> while aiming.

name: Finishing Shot
description: Deal ${15}% more damage to targets below 50% health.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> more damage to targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">50%</font> health.

name: Opening Strike
description: Heavy attacks deal ${10}% increased damage to foes with 100% health.
descriptionHtml: Heavy attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> increased damage to foes with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">100%</font> health.

name: Surprise Attack
description: Deal ${15}% extra damage to any foe as long as you have not damaged them in the last ${10}s.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> extra damage to any foe as long as you have not damaged them in the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font>.

name: Arrow Range
description: Increases the distance that arrows travel before being affected by gravity by 100%.
descriptionHtml: Increases the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">distance</font> that arrows travel before being affected by gravity by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">100%</font>.

name: Hawkeye
description: When you land a headshot, heal yourself for ${10}% of damage done.
descriptionHtml: When you land a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">headshot</font>, heal yourself for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> of damage done.

name: Bullseye
description: Increases critical chance of bow shots by ${10}%.
descriptionHtml: Increases critical chance of bow shots by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>.

name: Concussion
description: When you land a headshot, deal ${20}% more damage and have a ${50}% chance to get your arrow back.
descriptionHtml: When you land a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">headshot</font>, deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> more damage and have a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> chance to get your arrow back.

name: Pillar of Fire
description:
Invoke a burst of flames with a ${2.5}m radius at the target area that deals ${155}% weapon damage. 

Costs ${15} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Invoke a burst of flames with a ${2.5}m radius at the target area that deals ${155}% weapon damage. Costs ${15} Mana.

name: Strike The Match
description: Pillar of Fire deals ${5}% more damage for each stack of smolder on the target.
descriptionHtml: Pillar of Fire deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> more damage for each stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">smolder</font> on the target.

name: Arson's Advantage
description: Gain ${15}% of your max mana per enemy hit by Pillar of Fire.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> of your max mana per enemy hit by Pillar of Fire.

name: Meteor Shower
description:
Summon down a ${4.5}m radius rain of meteors for ${4}s up to ${20}m away. Deals ${100}% weapon damage to targets upon entering the area, then deals an additional ${50}% weapon damage every ${1}s while targets remain inside. 

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)

Costs ${30} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Summon down a ${4.5}m radius rain of meteors for ${4}s up to ${20}m away. Deals ${100}% weapon damage to targets upon entering the area, then deals an additional ${50}% weapon damage every ${1}s while targets remain inside. (This effect cannot be dispelled.) Costs ${30} Mana.

name: Immolation
description: Meteor Shower gives you ${3}% of your max mana for each instance of damage dealt.
descriptionHtml: Meteor Shower gives you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}%</font> of your max mana for each instance of damage dealt.

name: Judgment of Helios
description: Hitting a target that is inside meteor shower with a light or heavy attack will inflict smolder on targets, dealing ${5}% weapon damage each second for ${6}s.
descriptionHtml: Hitting a target that is inside meteor shower with a light or heavy attack will inflict smolder on targets, dealing ${5}% weapon damage each second for ${6}s.

name: Fiery Determination
description: Adds grit while casting Meteor Shower.\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml: Adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">grit</font> while casting Meteor Shower.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

name: Fireball
description:
Cast forth a heavy fireball that deals ${150}% weapon damage in a ${3}m radius on impact. 

Costs ${25} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Cast forth a heavy fireball that deals ${150}% weapon damage in a ${3}m radius on impact. Costs ${25} Mana.

name: Scorched Earth
description: Fireball hits now apply a stack of smolder on targets, dealing ${5}% weapon damage each second for ${6}s.
descriptionHtml: Fireball hits now apply a stack of smolder on targets, dealing ${5}% weapon damage each second for ${6}s.

name: Catch
description: Direct hits with Fireball give you ${10}% of your max mana and reduce your fire staff ability cooldowns by ${7.000000000000001}%.
descriptionHtml: Direct hits with Fireball give you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}% </font>of your max mana and reduce your fire staff ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${7.000000000000001}%</font>.

name: Spell Focus
description: Heavy attacks no longer consume mana and will now restore ${5}% of your max mana on hit.
descriptionHtml: Heavy attacks no longer consume <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">mana</font> and will now restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> of your max mana on hit.

name: Fiery Restoration
description: Heavy attacks reduce fire staff cooldowns by ${10}% on hit.
descriptionHtml: Heavy attacks reduce fire staff cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> on hit.

name: Clear Mind
description: While holding a fire staff and above 50% mana, gain ${5}% empower. (Empower increases damage.)
descriptionHtml: While holding a fire staff and above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">50%</font> mana, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}% empower</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Empower increases damage.)</font>

name: Flare
description: Heavy attacks now trigger a ${1}m splash on impact, but the damage is reduced to ${110.00000000000001}%.
descriptionHtml: Heavy attacks now trigger a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}m</font> splash on impact, but the damage is reduced to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${110.00000000000001}%</font>.

name: Singe
description: Light and Heavy attacks inflict a stack of smolder on foes, dealing ${5}% weapon damage each second for ${6}s. (Max ${5} stacks.).
descriptionHtml: Light and Heavy attacks inflict a stack of smolder on foes, dealing ${5}% weapon damage each second for ${6}s. (Max ${5} stacks.).

name: Spellslinger
description: Your fire staff abilities gain an extra ${10}% chance to critical strike.
descriptionHtml: Your fire staff abilities gain an extra <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> chance to critical strike.

name: Clear Casting
description: After not taking damage from an attack in the last ${3}s, deal ${5}% more damage.
descriptionHtml: After not taking damage from an attack in the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>, deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> more damage.

name: Prophet of a Fire God
description: While holding a fire staff, your critical strike damage is increased by ${15}%.
descriptionHtml: While holding a fire staff, your critical strike damage is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font>.

name: Runes of Helios
description:
Using a fire staff ability places a ${4}m rune on the ground that increases your damage by ${20}% while standing inside. The rune lasts for ${7}s. (Cooldown ${30}s).

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)
descriptionHtml:
Using a fire staff ability places a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}m</font> rune on the ground that increases your damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> while standing inside. The rune lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${7}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown ${30}s)</font>.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)</font>

name: Incinerate
description:
Cause a fiery explosion in a ${3}m radius area around yourself that deals ${125}% weapon damage and staggering your target. Inflicts smolder on struck foes, dealing ${5}% weapon damage each second for ${6}s. 

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Costs ${22} Mana.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your fire staff, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${3}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Cause a fiery explosion in a ${3}m radius area around yourself that deals ${125}% weapon damage and staggering your target. Inflicts smolder on struck foes, dealing ${5}% weapon damage each second for ${6}s. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) Costs ${22} Mana. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your fire staff, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${3}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Scorched
description: Each hit of Incinerate causes an additional stack of smolder.
descriptionHtml: Each hit of Incinerate causes an additional stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">smolder</font>.

name: Cauterize Wounds
description: Restore ${20}% of Incinerate damage dealt as health.
descriptionHtml: Restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> of Incinerate damage dealt as health.

name: Flame out!
description: Gain a stack of ${3}% empower for ${7}s for each target hit with incinerate. (Max ${5} stacks.)
descriptionHtml: Gain a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}%</font> empower for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${7}s</font> for each target hit with incinerate. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${5} stacks.)</font>

name: Flamethrower
description:
Create a 4m jet of flame from the staff dealing ${50}% weapon damage every second. Each hit inflicts a stack of smolder, dealing ${5}% weapon damage each second for ${6}s. (Max ${5} stacks.)

Costs ${5} Mana per second.
descriptionHtml: Create a 4m jet of flame from the staff dealing ${50}% weapon damage every second. Each hit inflicts a stack of smolder, dealing ${5}% weapon damage each second for ${6}s. (Max ${5} stacks.) Costs ${5} Mana per second.

name: Fire's Reach
description: Increase the range of Flamethrower by 50%.
descriptionHtml: Increase the range of Flamethrower by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">50%</font>.

name: Infernal Flames
description: Increase the base damage of Flamethrower by ${25}%.
descriptionHtml: Increase the base damage of Flamethrower by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font>.

name: Pyro Dancer
description: Flamethrower has no cooldown when canceled. While Flamethrower is active, being staggered will activate a 2.5s cooldown.
descriptionHtml: Flamethrower has no <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldown</font> when canceled. While Flamethrower is active, being staggered will activate a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">2.5s</font> cooldown.

Costs ${30} Mana.

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)

name: Raging Torrent
description: Perform 4 fast attacks, each dealing ${90}% weapon damage.
descriptionHtml: Perform 4 fast attacks, each dealing ${90}% weapon damage.

name: Aggressive Approach
description: Hitting a target with Raging Torrent grants haste, increasing movement speed by ${20}% for ${6}s.
descriptionHtml: Hitting a target with Raging Torrent grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">haste</font>, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${6}s</font>.

name: Final Blow
description: Press basic attack at the end of Raging Torrent to perform a final attack that deals ${120}% weapon damage.
descriptionHtml: Press basic attack at the end of Raging Torrent to perform a final attack that deals ${120}% weapon damage.

name: Enraged Strikes
description: Abilities and heavy attacks deal ${20}% more damage to targets below ${30}% health.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Abilities</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">heavy</font> attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> more damage to targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> health.

name: Accumulated Power
description: After 3 successful light attacks or aimed throws against the same target, gain empower, granting a ${20}% damage increase for ${3}s or until the next attack.
descriptionHtml: After <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">3</font> successful light attacks or aimed throws against the same target, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font>, granting a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> damage increase for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font> or until the next attack.

name: Relentless Fury
description: After a successful heavy attack, gain empower, granting a ${15}% damage increase for the next 4 attacks within ${5}s.
descriptionHtml: After a successful heavy attack, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font>, granting a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> damage increase for the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">4</font> attacks within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

name: Desperate Refresh
description: All cooldowns are reduced by ${2}% when hitting an enemy with an attack while your health is below ${30}%. (Max ${5} hits per attack.)
descriptionHtml: All cooldowns are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}%</font> when hitting an enemy with an attack while your health is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font>. (Max ${5} hits per attack.)

name: Against All Odds
description: Increase base damage by ${10}% for every enemy within ${5}m. (Max ${5} targets.)
descriptionHtml: Increase base damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for every enemy within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}m</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#808080">(Max ${5} targets.)</font>

name: Fortifying Strikes
description: Hitting a target with a heavy attack grants fortify, increasing armor by ${15}% for ${3}s.
descriptionHtml: Hitting a target with a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">heavy</font> attack grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">fortify</font>, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>.

name: Frenzied Purge
description: Remove all bleed, burn, and poison effects from yourself if you hit an enemy while your health is below ${30}%. (Cooldown ${60}s.)
descriptionHtml: Remove all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">bleed</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">burn</font>, and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">poison</font> effects from yourself if you hit an enemy while your health is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown ${60}s.)</font>

name: Defy Death
description: When you receive lethal damage, avoid death and become invulnerable for ${0.5}s and restore ${500} HP + ${50}% of your base health upon activation. (${60}s cooldown.)
descriptionHtml: When you receive lethal damage, avoid death and become invulnerable for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${0.5}s</font> and restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${500} HP</font> + <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> of your base health upon activation. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${60}s cooldown.)</font>

name: Rending Throw
description: Throw a hatchet up to 25m, dealing ${110.00000000000001}% weapon damage and applying rend, reducing target's armor by ${20}% for ${10}s.
descriptionHtml: Throw a hatchet up to 25m, dealing ${110.00000000000001}% weapon damage and applying rend, reducing target's armor by ${20}% for ${10}s.

name: Targeted Impact
description: Rend duration increased by ${4}s if the target is further than ${6}m away.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Rend</font> duration increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}s</font> if the target is further than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${6}m</font> away.

name: Opportunistic
description: If Rending Throw hits a target with an active debuff, it deals an additional ${20}% damage.
descriptionHtml: If Rending Throw hits a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font>, it deals an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> damage.

name: Second Wind
description: If Rending Throw hits a target with an active debuff, its cooldown is reduced by ${20}%.
descriptionHtml: If Rending Throw hits a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font>, its cooldown is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font>.

name: Social Distancing
description:
Throw a hatchet up to 25m forward, dealing ${114.99999999999999}% weapon damage and inflicting ${30}% slow for ${5}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

If standing still or moving backwards, you will dodge backwards obtaining momentary invulnerability. If moving sideways or forwards, you will continue moving unhindered.
descriptionHtml: Throw a hatchet up to 25m forward, dealing ${114.99999999999999}% weapon damage and inflicting ${30}% slow for ${5}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.) If standing still or moving backwards, you will dodge backwards obtaining momentary invulnerability. If moving sideways or forwards, you will continue moving unhindered.

name: Quick Power
description: If Social Distancing hits a target with an active debuff, gain haste, increasing your movement speed by ${20}% for ${6}s.
descriptionHtml: If Social Distancing hits a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font>, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">haste</font>, increasing your movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${6}s</font>.

name: Stay Back
description: Social Distancing hits apply a ${1}s root to targets.
descriptionHtml: Social Distancing hits apply a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}s root</font> to targets.

name: Infected Throw
description:
Leap into the air and throw a hatchet that deals ${140}% weapon damage.
This attack inflicts ${30}% disease and ${10}% weaken to your target for ${10}s.

(Disease reduces target's incoming healing efficiency and outgoing healing efficiency by half the incoming value.)
(Weaken reduces target's outgoing damage.)
descriptionHtml: Leap into the air and throw a hatchet that deals ${140}% weapon damage. This attack inflicts ${30}% disease and ${10}% weaken to your target for ${10}s. (Disease reduces target's incoming healing efficiency and outgoing healing efficiency by half the incoming value.) (Weaken reduces target's outgoing damage.)

name: Mortal Power
description: Increases the duration of disease and weaken by an additional ${5}s when hitting targets below ${50}% health.
descriptionHtml: Increases the duration of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">disease</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">weaken</font> by an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font> when hitting targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}% </font>health.

name: Aerial Transmission
description: Creates a ${3}m radius disease and weaken cloud on impact that lingers in place for 6s.
descriptionHtml: Creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}m </font>radius <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">disease</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">weaken</font> cloud on impact that lingers in place for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">6s</font>.

name: Aimed Throw
description: Replaces block with an aimed throw that deals ${100}% weapon damage. Hold block to enter aimed stance and press basic attack to throw.
descriptionHtml: Replaces block with an aimed throw that deals ${100}% weapon damage. Hold block to enter aimed stance and press basic attack to throw.

name: Critical Throw
description:
Increased critical hit chance of all melee attacks by ${5}%.

Increased critical hit chance of all ranged attacks by ${10}%.
descriptionHtml:
Increased critical hit chance of all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">melee</font> attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font>.

Increased critical hit chance of all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">ranged</font> attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>.

name: Exploitation
description: All attacks deal ${10}% additional damage to targets with an active debuff.
descriptionHtml: All attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> additional damage to targets with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font>.

name: On Fire
description: Every third thrown hatchet hit is a guaranteed critical hit.
descriptionHtml: Every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">third</font> thrown hatchet hit is a guaranteed critical hit.

name: Refreshing Throws
description: Thrown hatchets that hit targets with an active debuff reduce all hatchet ability cooldowns by ${5}%.
descriptionHtml: Thrown hatchets that hit targets with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font> reduce all hatchet ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font>.

name: Rejuvenating Crits
description: Critical hits with light attacks and aimed throws regenerate ${10} stamina.
descriptionHtml: Critical hits with light attacks and aimed throws regenerate <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}</font> stamina.

name: Hurling Force
description: Thrown hatchets deal additional damage based on distance from the target. Up to a max of ${20}% additional damage at ${20}m or greater.
descriptionHtml: Thrown hatchets deal additional damage based on distance from the target. Up to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> additional damage at <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}m</font> or greater.

name: Adrenaline Rush
description: Dodging within ${2}s of hitting a target with an ability consumes 25% less stamina.
descriptionHtml: Dodging within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font> of hitting a target with an ability consumes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">25%</font> less stamina.

name: Persistent Hinderance
description:
Hitting a target with a thrown hatchet extends the duration of all hatchet debuffs you applied on the target by ${20}%.

All attacks deal ${3}% additional damage per debuff on the target. (${4} debuffs max)
descriptionHtml:
Hitting a target with a thrown hatchet extends the duration of all hatchet <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuffs</font> you applied on the target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font>.

All attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}%</font> additional damage per <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font> on the target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${4} debuffs max)</font>

name: Ice Spikes
description:
Creates a trail of spikes that start from the player and go out in a straight line for 8m dealing ${56.00000000000001}% weapon damage. The final spike is a Mighty Spike that will deal ${157}% weapon damage, pushing back enemies. Pressing basic attack before the path fully forms will spawn the Mighty Spike early.

Cost ${15} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Creates a trail of spikes that start from the player and go out in a straight line for 8m dealing ${56.00000000000001}% weapon damage. The final spike is a Mighty Spike that will deal ${157}% weapon damage, pushing back enemies. Pressing basic attack before the path fully forms will spawn the Mighty Spike early. Cost ${15} Mana.

name: Refreshing Spikes
description: Cooldown for this ability reduced by ${10}%  if an enemy is hit by the Mighty Spike.
descriptionHtml: Cooldown for this ability reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}% </font> if an enemy is hit by the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Mighty Spike</font>.

name: Empowered Spikes
description: Mighty Spike damage increased by ${20}% when hitting an enemy below ${30}% health.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Mighty Spike</font> damage increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> when hitting an enemy below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> health.

name: Deadly Path
description: Increases damage by 10% and adds stagger to the path of spikes. (Does not increase Mighty Spike damage.)
descriptionHtml: Increases damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">10%</font> and adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">stagger</font> to the path of spikes. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Does not increase Mighty Spike damage.)</font>

name: Spiky Reach
description: Ice shards fire from the sides of the Mighty Spike to hit a wider area.  Each shard has a 6m range and deals ${118}% weapon damage.
descriptionHtml: Ice shards fire from the sides of the Mighty Spike to hit a wider area. Each shard has a 6m range and deals ${118}% weapon damage.

name: Ice Storm
description:
Create a 5m radius storm at the target area that deals ${17}% weapon damage every ${0.33}s for 5s. The storm also creates a frosted area that slows enemies in it by ${25}%. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)

Cost ${25} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Create a 5m radius storm at the target area that deals ${17}% weapon damage every ${0.33}s for 5s. The storm also creates a frosted area that slows enemies in it by ${25}%. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.) (This effect cannot be dispelled.) Cost ${25} Mana.

name: Weakening Gust
description: Ice Storm damage is increased by ${10}% to enemies below ${50}% health.
descriptionHtml: Ice Storm damage is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> to enemies below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> health.

name: Storm Summoner
description: Ice Storm mana cost is decreased by 80% while at full mana.
descriptionHtml: Ice Storm mana cost is decreased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">80%</font> while at full mana.

name: Punishing Storm
description: Increases Ice Storm damage by ${10}% for each enemy in Ice Storm. (Max ${5} targets.)
descriptionHtml: Increases Ice Storm damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for each enemy in Ice Storm. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#808080">(Max ${5} targets.)</font>

name: Wind Chill
description:
Blasts a column of freezing winds forward that pushes back enemies 5m and deals ${24}% weapon damage every 0.2s for 2s. Wind Chill has a total range of 7m with the farthest 2m increasing damage 20% without pushing enemies.

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

(Player is able to move during the attack.)

Cost ${20} Mana.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your ice gauntlet, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${3}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Blasts a column of freezing winds forward that pushes back enemies 5m and deals ${24}% weapon damage every 0.2s for 2s. Wind Chill has a total range of 7m with the farthest 2m increasing damage 20% without pushing enemies. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) (Player is able to move during the attack.) Cost ${20} Mana. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your ice gauntlet, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${3}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Enduring Chill
description: Increase duration of Wind Chill by 1s.
descriptionHtml: Increase duration of Wind Chill by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">1s</font>.

name: Chilling Blast
description: Increase the damage of the last 2m of the Wind Chill range by ${25}%.
descriptionHtml: Increase the damage of the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">2m</font> of the Wind Chill range by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font>.

name: Cold Reach
description: Increase damage of basic attacks by ${15}% for targets within ${15}m of player.
descriptionHtml: Increase damage of basic attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> for targets within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}m</font> of player.

name: Critical Rejuvenation
description: Gain ${15} mana whenever you critically hit a target.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}</font> mana whenever you critically hit a target.

name: Energized Critical
description: Increase critical damage of ice gauntlet abilities by ${10}% while stamina is full.
descriptionHtml: Increase critical damage of ice gauntlet abilities by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> while stamina is full.

name: Gathering Storm
description: Gain ${15} mana whenever you hit with ${3} consecutive light attacks.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}</font> mana whenever you hit with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}</font> consecutive light attacks.

name: Critical Frost
description: Increase critical chance by ${15}% when hitting an enemy in a frosted area or when hitting an enemy with frostbite.
descriptionHtml: Increase <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">critical chance</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> when hitting an enemy in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">frosted area</font> or when hitting an enemy with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">frostbite</font>.

name: Heavy Freeze
description: Heavy attacks will root a target for ${1}s if they are standing in Ice Storm or have frostbite. (This effect has a ${4}s cooldown after root expires.)
descriptionHtml: Heavy attacks will <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">root</font> a target for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}s</font> if they are standing in Ice Storm or have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">frostbite</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a ${4}s cooldown after root expires.)</font>

name: Ultimate Chill
description: Ice gauntlet abilities chill targets, increasing ice damage dealt to the target by ${25}% for ${3}s. Ice Pylon attacks do not apply chill.
descriptionHtml: Ice gauntlet abilities <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">chill</font> targets, increasing ice damage dealt to the target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>. Ice Pylon attacks do not apply chill.

name: Ice Pylon
description:
Place a pylon that fires ice projectiles at enemies within 20m. Projectiles deal ${75}% weapon damage if they hit. Ice Pylon health will be 20% of players max health. Ice Pylon creates a 1m radius frosted area around itself and lasts for 15s unless it is destroyed. Hold ability input for 1s to despawn Ice Pylon.

Cost ${15} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Place a pylon that fires ice projectiles at enemies within 20m. Projectiles deal ${75}% weapon damage if they hit. Ice Pylon health will be 20% of players max health. Ice Pylon creates a 1m radius frosted area around itself and lasts for 15s unless it is destroyed. Hold ability input for 1s to despawn Ice Pylon. Cost ${15} Mana.

name: Greater Pylon
description: Increases damage of Ice Pylon by ${10}% against slowed targets.
descriptionHtml: Increases damage of Ice Pylon by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> against <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">slowed</font> targets.

name: Pylon Regen
description: Ice Pylon regenerates to full health ${5}s after last damage taken.
descriptionHtml: Ice Pylon regenerates to full health <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font> after last damage taken.

name: Pylon Dodge
description: Dodging increases Ice Pylon rate of fire for 3s.
descriptionHtml: Dodging increases Ice Pylon rate of fire for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">3s</font>.

name: Pylon Refresh
description: A successful hit from the Ice Pylon extends its lifetime by 1s. (Maximum ${45}s.)
descriptionHtml: A successful hit from the Ice Pylon extends its lifetime by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">1s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Maximum ${45}s.)</font>

name: Ice Shower
description:
Summon a shower of ice that creates a frosted area approximately 1m by 5m that lasts for 4s. Enemies that enter the Ice Shower will be stricken with a powerful frostbite.

Frostbite roots for ${1}s, slows movement speed by ${50}%, and will remain on target for ${3}s after exiting the Ice Shower. (Ice Shower's root can only be applied once every ${6}s to the same target.)

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)

Cost ${25} Mana.
descriptionHtml:
Summon a shower of ice that creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">frosted area</font> approximately <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">1m by 5m</font> that lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">4s</font>. Enemies that enter the Ice Shower will be stricken with a powerful <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">frostbite</font>.

Frostbite <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">roots</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}s</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">slows</font> movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font>, and will remain on target for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font> after exiting the Ice Shower. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Ice Shower's root can only be applied once every ${6}s to the same target.)</font><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)</font>

Cost <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}</font> Mana.

name: Enduring Shower
description: Increase Ice Shower duration to 7s.
descriptionHtml: Increase Ice Shower duration to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">7s</font>.

name: Quick Shower
description: Any ally, including self, will get a ${25}% haste for ${2}s when entering Ice Shower.
descriptionHtml: Any ally, including self, will get a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font> when entering Ice Shower.

name: Frigid Showers
description: Frostbite applies rend to target, reducing their defense by ${10}%.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Frostbite</font> applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">rend</font> to target, reducing their defense by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>.

name: Entombed
description:
Entomb yourself in ice to become invulnerable and greatly increase mana regeneration. The tomb lasts for 10s but can be destroyed early. Tomb health will be 50% of players max health.

Press ability input, block, or dodge to exit the tomb normally or press basic attack to exit while causing a damaging push at the cost of ${10} mana. The push deals ${70}% weapon damage to enemies in a 3m radius.

Cost ${0} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Entomb yourself in ice to become invulnerable and greatly increase mana regeneration. The tomb lasts for 10s but can be destroyed early. Tomb health will be 50% of players max health. Press ability input, block, or dodge to exit the tomb normally or press basic attack to exit while causing a damaging push at the cost of ${10} mana. The push deals ${70}% weapon damage to enemies in a 3m radius. Cost ${0} Mana.
