name: Magnify
description: When you heal a target with Light's Embrace, extend the duration of Life Staff buffs on that target by ${2}s.
descriptionHtml: When you <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">heal</font> a target with Light's Embrace, extend the duration of Life Staff <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">buffs</font> on that target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font>.

name: Beacon
description:
Shoot out a light projectile that deals ${146}% weapon damage to enemies, attaches to its target and heals all allies in a ${3}m radius for ${16}% weapon damage each second for 10s. 

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)

Costs ${16} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Shoot out a light projectile that deals ${146}% weapon damage to enemies, attaches to its target and heals all allies in a ${3}m radius for ${16}% weapon damage each second for 10s. (This effect cannot be dispelled.) Costs ${16} Mana.

name: Infused Light
description: Beacon's area of effect radius is increased to ${4.5}m.
descriptionHtml: Beacon's area of effect radius is increased to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4.5}m</font>.

name: Radiance's Blessing
description: Beacon lasts 5s longer.
descriptionHtml: Beacon lasts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">5s</font> longer.

name: Speed of Light
description: Allies in the Beacon AOE now gain ${20}% haste for ${3}s. (Haste increases movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: Allies in the Beacon AOE now gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

name: Bend Light
description: After a dodge, your outgoing healing is ${20}% more effective for ${5}s.
descriptionHtml: After a dodge, your <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">outgoing healing</font> is <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> more effective for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

name: Defensive Light
description: When you block a melee attack, regain ${5}% of your mana.
descriptionHtml: When you block a melee attack, regain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> of your mana.

name: Protector's Touch
description: Life Staff's basic attacks grant ${15}% fortify for ${3}s when hitting an enemy. (Fortify increases armor)
descriptionHtml: Life Staff's basic attacks grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font> when hitting an enemy. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor)</font>

name: Protector's Strength
description: If you have a buff, all outgoing healing is increased by ${20}%.
descriptionHtml: If you have a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">buff</font>, all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">outgoing healing</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font>.

name: Balance
description: When you get hit while below 50% health, gain ${10}% haste for ${5}s. (Cooldown ${20}s.)
descriptionHtml: When you get hit while below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">50%</font> health, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown ${20}s.)</font>

name: Spirits United
description: Increases mana regeneration for you and group members by ${3}%.
descriptionHtml: Increases mana regeneration for you and group members by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}%</font>.

name: Glowing Focus
description: Life Staff buffs you grant last ${20}% longer.
descriptionHtml: Life Staff buffs you grant last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> longer.

name: Power Shot
description:
Overload your musket with gun powder, causing the next shot to deal ${160}% weapon damage, and an additional ${30}% to hostile AI targets.

(Does not stack with Powder Burn.)
descriptionHtml: Overload your musket with gun powder, causing the next shot to deal ${160}% weapon damage, and an additional ${30}% to hostile AI targets. (Does not stack with Powder Burn.)

name: Initial Engagement
description: When you hit with Power Shot, gain empower, increasing damage by ${10}% for ${5}s.
descriptionHtml: When you hit with Power Shot, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font>, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

name: First Blood
description: Power Shot deals ${10}% additional damage to targets with full health.
descriptionHtml: Power Shot deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> additional damage to targets with full health.

name: Bullseye
description: Power Shot headshots reduce Power Shot's cooldown by ${15}%.
descriptionHtml: Power Shot <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">headshots</font> reduce Power Shot's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldown</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font>.

name: Powder Burn
description:
Overload your musket with gun powder, causing the next shot to deal ${110.00000000000001}% weapon damage and inflict a burn that deals ${20}% weapon damage per second for ${9}s.

(Does not stack with Power Shot.)
descriptionHtml: Overload your musket with gun powder, causing the next shot to deal ${110.00000000000001}% weapon damage and inflict a burn that deals ${20}% weapon damage per second for ${9}s. (Does not stack with Power Shot.)

name: Backdraft
description: Standard musket shots deal ${12}% additional damage if they hit a burning target.
descriptionHtml: Standard musket shots deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${12}%</font> additional damage if they hit a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">burning</font> target.

name: Chronic Trauma
description: If Powder Burn is a headshot, the burn duration is extended by ${4}s.
descriptionHtml: If Powder Burn is a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">headshot</font>, the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">burn</font> duration is extended by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}s</font>.

name: Shooter's Stance
description:
Player enters a crouching aim stance to enhance shooting performance. While in this stance, shots deal ${100}% weapon damage, mobility is reduced to zero and reload time is reduced by 75%. 

Shooter's Stance ends after 3 shots.

(Power shot and powder burn can be used while inside shooter's stance.)
descriptionHtml: Player enters a crouching aim stance to enhance shooting performance. While in this stance, shots deal ${100}% weapon damage, mobility is reduced to zero and reload time is reduced by 75%. Shooter's Stance ends after 3 shots. (Power shot and powder burn can be used while inside shooter's stance.)

name: Shoot More
description: Shots fired before exiting stance increased to 5.
descriptionHtml: Shots fired before exiting stance increased to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">5</font>.

name: Marksman
description: If 3 consecutive shots hit the same target, reduce all other musket cooldowns by ${25}%.
descriptionHtml: If <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">3</font> consecutive shots hit the same target, reduce all other musket <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldowns</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font>.

name: Critical Reload
description: Landing 2 headshots within ${5}s of each other reduces the duration of the next reload.
descriptionHtml: Landing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">2 headshots</font> within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font> of each other reduces the duration of the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">reload</font>.

name: Called Shot
description: Increase musket damage by ${10}% after aiming down sights for more than ${2}s.
descriptionHtml: Increase musket damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> after aiming down sights for more than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font>.

name: Quick Load
description: If ${2} or more targets are hit with a single shot, reduce the duration of the next reload. (${4}s cooldown)
descriptionHtml: If <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}</font> or more targets are hit with a single shot, reduce the duration of the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">reload</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${4}s cooldown)</font>

name: Empowering Headshot
description: On a successful headshot, gain empower, increasing damage dealt by ${10}% for ${5}s.
descriptionHtml: On a successful <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">headshot</font>, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font>, increasing damage dealt by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

name: Shell Shock
description: Headshots weaken targets, decreasing their damage by ${10}% for ${4}s. (${8}s cooldown)
descriptionHtml: Headshots <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">weaken</font> targets, decreasing their damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${8}s cooldown)</font>

name: Called Shot Resupply
description: Basic attack headshots reduce all musket ability cooldowns by ${10}%.
descriptionHtml: Basic attack <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">headshots</font> reduce all musket ability <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldowns</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>.

name: Optimal Range
description:
Musket shots deal ${10}% increased base damage to targets ${20}m or further away from the player. 

Also deal ${5}% increased damage to targets within ${50}m.
descriptionHtml:
Musket shots deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> increased base damage to targets <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}m</font> or further away from the player. 

Also deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> increased damage to targets within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}m</font>.

name: Heightened Precision
description: Successful hits with a musket grant a stackable 2.5% damage increase. This effect ends after more than ${5}s passes between shots. (Max ${6} stacks.)
descriptionHtml: Successful hits with a musket grant a stackable <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">2.5%</font> damage increase. This effect ends after more than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font> passes between shots. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${6} stacks.)</font>

name: Deadeye
description:
Grants a ${15}% damage increase to all headshots. 

If multiple targets are hit when you get a headshot, the next shot within ${3}s inflicts bleed to all targets the shot passes through, dealing ${15}% weapon damage every second for ${5}s.
descriptionHtml: Grants a ${15}% damage increase to all headshots. If multiple targets are hit when you get a headshot, the next shot within ${3}s inflicts bleed to all targets the shot passes through, dealing ${15}% weapon damage every second for ${5}s.

name: Traps
description: Deploy a trap that lasts for 30s. When triggered, it deals ${25}% weapon damage and causes its target to be rooted, immobilizing them for ${3}s.
descriptionHtml: Deploy a trap that lasts for 30s. When triggered, it deals ${25}% weapon damage and causes its target to be rooted, immobilizing them for ${3}s.

name: Trapped Damage
description: Traps apply rend to targets that trigger them, increasing damage taken by ${20}% for ${3}s.
descriptionHtml: Traps apply <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">rend</font> to targets that trigger them, increasing damage taken by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>.

name: Scent of Blood
description: Dealing damage to a trapped target heals you for ${100}% of weapon damage dealt.
descriptionHtml: Dealing damage to a trapped target <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">heals</font> you for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${100}%</font> of weapon damage dealt.

name: Double Trap
description: Gain an extra trap per cooldown, allowing 2 active traps to be placed in the world.
descriptionHtml: Gain an extra trap per cooldown, allowing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">2</font> active traps to be placed in the world.

name: Sticky Bomb
description:
Throw a short range bomb that sticks to anything it makes contact with.

Detonation will occur 3s after impact dealing ${210}% weapon damage to all targets within a ${3}m radius.
descriptionHtml: Throw a short range bomb that sticks to anything it makes contact with. Detonation will occur 3s after impact dealing ${210}% weapon damage to all targets within a ${3}m radius.

name: Unflinching Walk
description: Sticky Bomb grants the player ${40} stamina when it deals damage with an explosion.
descriptionHtml: Sticky Bomb grants the player <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${40}</font> stamina when it deals damage with an explosion.

name: Sticky Slow
description: Direct hits with the Sticky Bomb cause the target to be slowed by ${15}% for ${3}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: Direct hits with the Sticky Bomb cause the target to be <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">slowed</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

name: Stopping Power
description: A Powerful shot that deals ${90}% weapon damage, staggering the target and knocking back ${3}m. (Can be fired from hip or while aiming down sights.)
descriptionHtml: A Powerful shot that deals ${90}% weapon damage, staggering the target and knocking back ${3}m. (Can be fired from hip or while aiming down sights.)

name: Lasting Impression
description: Targets hit with Stopping Power are exhausted, reducing their stamina regeneration speed by ${10}% for ${8}s.
descriptionHtml: Targets hit with Stopping Power are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">exhausted</font>, reducing their stamina regeneration speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${8}s</font>.

name: Supplementary Repulsion
description: Targets hit with Stopping Power are slowed by ${10}% for ${8}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: Targets hit with Stopping Power are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">slowed</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${8}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

name: Salt On The Wounds
description: Deal ${10}% increased damage to targets below ${30}% health.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> increased damage to targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> health.

name: Back It Up
description: Walking/Strafing movement speed increased by ${10}% when an enemy is within 8m of player.
descriptionHtml: Walking/Strafing movement speed increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> when an enemy is within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">8m</font> of player.

name: Weakened Defense
description:
Increases the stamina damage from standard shots dealt to enemies blocking with shields by ${50}%.

Increases armor penetration against targets that are not blocking with a shield by ${10}%.
descriptionHtml:
Increases the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">stamina damage</font> from standard shots dealt to enemies blocking with shields by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font>.

Increases <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">armor penetration</font> against targets that are not blocking with a shield by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>.

name: Empowering Weakness
description: Hitting a target with an active debuff grants empower, increasing your damage by ${5}% for ${5}s.
descriptionHtml: Hitting a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font> grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font>, increasing your damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

name: Hustle
description: After a dodge, gain a ${10}% haste for ${3}s. (Haste increases movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: After a dodge, gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

name: Tactical Reload
description: Dodging reloads the musket. (Can only trigger once every ${6}s.)
descriptionHtml: Dodging <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">reloads</font> the musket. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Can only trigger once every ${6}s.)</font>

name: Energy Burst
description: Attacking a target with an active debuff restores ${5} stamina.
descriptionHtml: Attacking a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font> restores <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}</font> stamina.

name: Kick 'em When They're Down
description: Deal ${10}% extra damage to targets with an active crowd control status effect. (Slow, Root, Stun.)
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> extra damage to targets with an active crowd control status effect. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow, Root, Stun.)</font>

name: Lethal Combo
description: Increase musket damage by ${20}% against targets affected by Trapper tree debuffs.
descriptionHtml: Increase musket damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> against targets affected by Trapper tree <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuffs</font>.

name: Tondo
description: Slash so quickly that it extends the reach of your blade up to 5m. This strike deals ${50}% weapon damage and applies a bleed that will deal an additional ${10}% weapon damage per second for ${12}s. (Stacks up to 3 times and refreshes previous applications.)
descriptionHtml: Slash so quickly that it extends the reach of your blade up to 5m. This strike deals ${50}% weapon damage and applies a bleed that will deal an additional ${10}% weapon damage per second for ${12}s. (Stacks up to 3 times and refreshes previous applications.)

name: Thirst For Blood
description: When applying the first bleed stack to an opponent, Tondo's cooldown is reduced by ${10}%.
descriptionHtml: When applying the first <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">bleed</font> stack to an opponent, Tondo's cooldown is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>.

name: And Again
description: If you hit only 1 target, even on a blocked hit, Tondo's cooldown is reduced by ${25}%.
descriptionHtml: If you hit only <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">1</font> target, even on a blocked hit, Tondo's cooldown is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font>.

name: Proper Spacing
description: Increases initial hit damage from Tondo by ${100}% if the target is already inflicted with rapier's bleed.
descriptionHtml: Increases initial hit damage from Tondo by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${100}%</font> if the target is already inflicted with rapier's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">bleed</font>.

name: Flurry
description:
Enter a posed stance and unleash a series of 5 quick thrust attacks with each strike dealing ${60}% weapon damage. 

Flurry can be canceled at any time by dodging or by using another ability.

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml: Enter a posed stance and unleash a series of 5 quick thrust attacks with each strike dealing ${60}% weapon damage. Flurry can be canceled at any time by dodging or by using another ability. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

name: Overwhelm
description: Each hit of Flurry does ${25}% more block damage.
descriptionHtml: Each hit of Flurry does <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font> more block damage.

name: To the Bone
description: Each hit of Flurry extends the rapier's bleed by ${1}s. (Future stacking applications of this extended bleed will also be extended to its longer duration.)
descriptionHtml: Each hit of Flurry extends the rapier's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">bleed</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Future stacking applications of this extended bleed will also be extended to its longer duration.)</font>

name: Fleeting Strikes
description: Each hit of Flurry reduces its cooldown by ${5}%.
descriptionHtml: Each hit of Flurry reduces its cooldown by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font>.

name: Finalize
description: The last hit of Flurry will inflict the enemy with a stack of bleed, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second for ${12}s.
descriptionHtml: The last hit of Flurry will inflict the enemy with a stack of bleed, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second for ${12}s.

name: Flourish and Finish
description:
Flourish performs an attack dealing ${60}% weapon damage, staggering and pushing back enemies. 

Pressing basic attack at the end of Flourish will perform the follow up attack, Finish. 

Finish lunges forward dealing ${120}% direct weapon damage and consumes all rapier bleeds on any target hit dealing ${110.00000000000001}% of their damage immediately.
descriptionHtml: Flourish performs an attack dealing ${60}% weapon damage, staggering and pushing back enemies. Pressing basic attack at the end of Flourish will perform the follow up attack, Finish. Finish lunges forward dealing ${120}% direct weapon damage and consumes all rapier bleeds on any target hit dealing ${110.00000000000001}% of their damage immediately.

name: With Flair
description: Gain grit on both Flourish and Finish. \n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">grit</font> on both Flourish and Finish. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

name: Swagger
description: Gain ${20} stamina when successfully hitting a target with Finish.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}</font> stamina when successfully hitting a target with Finish.

name: Fuel
description: Each tick of damage from Tondo's bleed reduces the cooldown of this ability by ${3.5000000000000004}%.
descriptionHtml: Each tick of damage from Tondo's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">bleed</font> reduces the cooldown of this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3.5000000000000004}%</font>.

name: Bloody End
description: Finish deals ${150}% of the rapier's bleed damage instead of only ${110.00000000000001}%.
descriptionHtml: Finish deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${150}%</font> of the rapier's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">bleed</font> damage instead of only <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${110.00000000000001}%</font>.

name: Light Edge
description: Increase damage from both middle swipe attacks in the light attack chain by ${8}%.
descriptionHtml: Increase damage from both middle swipe attacks in the light attack chain by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${8}%</font>.

name: Refreshing Strikes
description: Reduce all rapier cooldowns by ${1}% on any hit. (Max ${5} reductions per attack.)
descriptionHtml: Reduce all rapier cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}%</font> on any hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${5} reductions per attack.)</font>

name: Heavy Puncture
description: Any heavy attack on a bleeding enemy will extend their rapier bleeds by ${2}s. (Future stacking applications of this extended bleed will also be extended to its longer duration.)
descriptionHtml: Any heavy attack on a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">bleeding</font> enemy will extend their rapier <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">bleeds</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Future stacking applications of this extended bleed will also be extended to its longer duration.)</font>

name: Unerring
description: Deal ${5}% more damage to targets with a rapier bleed.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> more damage to targets with a rapier <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">bleed</font>.

name: Engarde
description: Deal ${10}% more damage when your target has greater than ${50}% health.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> more damage when your target has greater than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> health.

name: Riposte
description:
Enter into a defensive stance for 1s. If struck during this ability, counter the attacker dealing ${50}%  weapon damage, staggering and stunning them for ${2}s. You are briefly invulnerable upon a successful Riposte.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your rapier, activating this ability inflicts taunt for ${4}s to all foes within 5m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml:
Enter into a defensive stance for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">1s</font>. If struck during this ability, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">counter</font> the attacker dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}% </font> weapon damage, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">staggering</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">stunning</font> them for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font>. You are briefly <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">invulnerable</font> upon a successful Riposte.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your rapier, activating this ability inflicts taunt for ${4}s to all foes within 5m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)</font>

name: Insult to Injury
description: If riposte successfully hits a target, gain empower, increasing damage by ${10}% for ${3}s.
descriptionHtml: If riposte successfully hits a target, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font>, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>.

name: Priority
description: Reduce the cooldown of other rapier abilities by ${20}% when landing a Riposte counter attack.
descriptionHtml: Reduce the cooldown of other rapier abilities by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> when landing a Riposte counter attack.

name: Lasting Consequence
description: Increase the stun from Riposte to ${2.5}s.
descriptionHtml: Increase the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">stun</font> from Riposte to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2.5}s</font>.

name: Fleche
description: Leave the ground lunging forward for 10m in a stabbing motion and pierce through enemies dealing ${145}% weapon damage.
descriptionHtml: Leave the ground lunging forward for 10m in a stabbing motion and pierce through enemies dealing ${145}% weapon damage.

name: Quick Lunge
description: Killing with this ability reduces its cooldown by ${80}%.
descriptionHtml: Killing with this ability reduces its cooldown by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${80}%</font>.

name: Backside
description: After performing Fleche, your next critical strike within ${5}s will deal ${15}% more damage.
descriptionHtml: After performing Fleche, your next critical strike within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font> will deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> more damage.

name: Interruption
description: Pressing basic attack any time during Fleche will stop and perform a static, continuation attack dealing ${114.99999999999999}% damage.
descriptionHtml: Pressing basic attack any time during Fleche will stop and perform a static, continuation attack dealing ${114.99999999999999}% damage.

name: Evade
description: Perform a small, reliable sidestep in your current movement direction that cancels any current activity and provides momentary invulnerability. Light attacks made during Evade are performed exceptionally fast.
descriptionHtml: Perform a small, reliable sidestep in your current movement direction that cancels any current activity and provides momentary <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">invulnerability</font>. Light attacks made during Evade are performed exceptionally fast.

name: Crescendo
description: Individual successful light attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability by ${30}% each.
descriptionHtml: Individual successful light attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> each.

name: Allegro
description: Gain ${20}% haste for ${3}s after successfully evading through an enemy attack. (Haste increases movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font> after successfully evading through an enemy attack. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

name: Adagio
description: Evading forward gains ${15}% increased damage on your next light attack. Ends on hit or after ${1}s.
descriptionHtml: Evading forward gains <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> increased damage on your next light attack. Ends on hit or after <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}s</font>.

name: Breathe In
description: Gain ${20} stamina after successfully evading through an enemy attack.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}</font> stamina after successfully evading through an enemy attack.

name: Perfectionist
description: Deal ${10}% more damage when your health is full.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> more damage when your health is full.

name: Controlled Breathing
description: Gain ${3} stamina on any hit.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}</font> stamina on any hit.

name: Swiftness
description: Gain ${3}% haste for ${4}s on rapier hits. Can stack up to ${5} times. (Haste increases movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}s</font> on rapier hits. Can stack up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}</font> times. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

name: Desperation
description: Deal ${10}% more damage when your stamina is below ${40}%.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> more damage when your stamina is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${40}%.</font>

name: Momentum
description: Deal ${30}% increased damage on your next light or heavy attack after performing an ability. Ends on hit or after ${3}s.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> increased damage on your next light or heavy attack after performing an ability. Ends on hit or after <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>.

name: Red Curtains
description: Critical strikes reduce all cooldowns by ${5}%. (Max ${5} reductions per attack.)
descriptionHtml: Critical strikes reduce all cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${5} reductions per attack.)</font>

name: Javelin
description: Throw your spear, dealing ${80}% weapon damage and staggering on hit.
descriptionHtml: Throw your spear, dealing ${80}% weapon damage and staggering on hit.

name: Forceful Impact
description: Targets are knocked down on hit.
descriptionHtml: Targets are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">knocked down</font> on hit.

name: Refreshing Precision
description: Headshots reduce Javelin's cooldown by ${25}%.
descriptionHtml: Headshots reduce Javelin's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldown</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font>.

name: Deadly Distance
description: Javelin deals 2.5% bonus damage per meter traveled. (Max 100%.)
descriptionHtml: Javelin deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">2.5%</font> bonus damage per meter traveled. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 100%.)</font>

name: Sweep
description: Sweep the target's legs, dealing ${45}% weapon damage and causing a knock down.
descriptionHtml: Sweep the target's legs, dealing ${45}% weapon damage and causing a knock down.

name: Tenacious Sweep
description: Grit is now active during the attack.\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Grit</font> is now active during the attack.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

name: Coup de Grce
description: Press basic attack during Sweep to follow up with a heavy stab that deals ${150}% weapon damage.
descriptionHtml: Press basic attack during Sweep to follow up with a heavy stab that deals ${150}% weapon damage.

name: Cyclone
description:
Perform a spin attack that deals ${165}% weapon damage to targets within a 3m radius, and applies a ${30}% slow for ${3}s. This ability has grit.

(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your spear, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${2}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Perform a spin attack that deals ${165}% weapon damage to targets within a 3m radius, and applies a ${30}% slow for ${3}s. This ability has grit. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.) (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your spear, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${2}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Invigorating Combo
description: Restore ${25} stamina per target hit.
descriptionHtml: Restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}</font> stamina per target hit.

name: Strong Momentum
description: Cyclone now pushes the target back ${3}m.
descriptionHtml: Cyclone now <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">pushes</font> the target back <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}m</font>.

descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> increased damage on consecutive heavy attacks against a single target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${3} stacks.)</font>

description: Critical chance is increased by ${10}% when attacking targets that are at least 3m away.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Critical chance</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> when attacking targets that are at least <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">3m</font> away.

name: Refreshing Reach
description: Successful heavy attacks reduce all spear cooldowns by ${15}%. (Max 1 reduction per attack.)
descriptionHtml: Successful heavy attacks reduce all spear <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldowns</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 1 reduction per attack.)</font>

name: Evasive Maneuvers

descriptionHtml: Dodging consumes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">20%</font> less stamina for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font> after a successful hit.

name: Invigorating Crits
description: Restore ${20} stamina on critical hits.
descriptionHtml: Restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}</font> stamina on critical hits.

name: Merciless Strength

descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font> increased damage against <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">knocked down</font> targets.

name: Defensive Stance
description: Gain fortify after successful heavy attacks, increasing armor by ${15}% for ${2}s.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">fortify</font> after successful heavy attacks, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font>.

name: Strong Conditioning
description: Stamina regeneration rate is increased by ${30}% when your stamina is below 50%.
descriptionHtml: Stamina regeneration rate is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> when your stamina is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">50%</font>.

description: Deal ${25}% increased damage while stamina is full.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font> increased damage while stamina is full.

descriptionHtml: Rush forward and skewer your target, dealing ${125}% weapon damage and applying bleed. Bleed deals ${20}% weapon damage every ${1}s for ${10}s.

descriptionHtml: Skewer deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> increased damage against targets that have full health.

name: Follow Through

descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font> if Skewer critical hits, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font>.

name: Deep Wound
description: Bleed duration increased to ${15}s.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Bleed</font> duration increased to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}s</font>.

descriptionHtml: Execute 3 quick piercing strikes that each deal ${80}% weapon damage and apply rend, reducing the target's armor by ${5}% for ${10}s. (Max ${3} stacks.)

name: Rupturing Strikes

descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Rend</font> increased to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> per strike against targets above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> health.

descriptionHtml: Each attack inflicts a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">weaken</font> to the target, reducing target's outgoing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${3} stacks.)</font>

name: Vault Kick
description:
Use your spear to vault forward and kick your target, dealing ${75}% weapon damage and staggering them. Applies stun for ${1.5}s.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your spear, this ability inflicts taunt for ${2}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Use your spear to vault forward and kick your target, dealing ${75}% weapon damage and staggering them. Applies stun for ${1.5}s. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your spear, this ability inflicts taunt for ${2}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Relentless Blows
description: Gain empower after successful hits on targets below ${50}% health, increasing damage by ${20}% for ${5}s.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font> after successful hits on targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> health, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

name: Continuous Motion
description: Cooldowns for other spear abilities are reduced by ${30}% on successful hit. (Max 1 reduction per ability use.)
descriptionHtml: Cooldowns for other spear abilities are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> on successful hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 1 reduction per ability use.)</font>

name: Precise Jabs
description: Light attacks have a ${5}% increased critical chance.
descriptionHtml: Light attacks have a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> increased <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">critical chance</font>.

name: Refreshing Jabs
description: All spear ability cooldowns are reduced by ${10}% on the second hit of the light attack chain. (Max 1 reduction per attack.)
descriptionHtml: All spear ability <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldowns</font> are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> on the second hit of the light attack chain. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 1 reduction per attack.)</font>

name: Crippling Jabs
description: The last hit of the light attack chain applies ${30}% slow for ${3}s to targets below ${30}% health. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: The last hit of the light attack chain applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}% slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font> to targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> health. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> increased damage against targets with less than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> health.

name: Unerring Precision

descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> increased damage against targets with active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">grit</font>.

descriptionHtml: The first successful hit with an ability within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font> of dodging reduces all spear cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 1 reduction per ability use.)</font>

descriptionHtml: Critical hits extend the duration of your spear <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuffs</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font>.

descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Critical chance</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> when attacking a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">bleeding</font> target.

descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> bonus damage for each <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font> on your target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 30%.)</font>

name: Reverse Stab
description: A stab attack that deals ${175}% weapon damage.
descriptionHtml: A stab attack that deals ${175}% weapon damage.

name: Unstoppable Stab

descriptionHtml: Reverse Stab now has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">grit</font>.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

descriptionHtml: On a successful hit with Reverse Stab, all other sword <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldowns</font> are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max 1 reduction per ability use.)</font>

descriptionHtml: Quickly spin around while extending the sword out, dealing two hits of ${80}% weapon damage to all foes within 2m.

descriptionHtml: Whirling Blade inflicts a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}% rend</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Rend reduces target's armor.)</font>

descriptionHtml: Whirling Blade reduces its own <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldown</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> for each enemy hit.

description: Leap forward, dealing ${100}% weapon damage and staggering your target.
descriptionHtml: Leap forward, dealing ${100}% weapon damage and staggering your target.

descriptionHtml: If you hit a foe below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> health, deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> more damage.

description: Sword and shield critical strike chance increased by ${10}%.
descriptionHtml: Sword and shield <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">critical strike chance</font> increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>.

descriptionHtml: Successfully hitting with a heavy attack causes you to lose <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">1 debuff</font>.

(Max ${5} stacks.)</font>

name: Critical Precision
description: On critical, gain ${20}% haste for ${5}s. (Haste increases movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: On critical, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

name: Shield Bash
description:
Deals ${50}% weapon damage, staggering and stunning foes in front of you for ${2}s. 

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) 

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your sword, this ability inflicts taunt for ${6}s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Deals ${50}% weapon damage, staggering and stunning foes in front of you for ${2}s. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your sword, this ability inflicts taunt for ${6}s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Intimidating Bash
description: Shield Bash causes greatly increased threat and now deals ${75}% weapon damage.
descriptionHtml: Shield Bash causes greatly increased threat and now deals ${75}% weapon damage.

name: Concussive Bash

descriptionHtml: Shield Bash stun <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">duration</font> increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">1s</font>.

name: Shield Rush
description:
Rush forward 5m, staggering and pushing back foes. This attack deals ${100}% weapon damage.

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml: Rush forward 5m, staggering and pushing back foes. This attack deals ${100}% weapon damage. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

descriptionHtml: On a successful hit, all enemies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">5m</font> are inflicted by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}% weaken</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Weaken reduces target's outgoing damage.)</font>

name: Intimidating Rush
description: On a successful hit, all enemies within 5m of you are slowed by ${30}% for ${4}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: On a successful hit, all enemies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">5m</font> of you are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">slowed</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

name: Defender's Resolve
description:
For 8s, reduce the incoming base damage from attackers by ${30}% and reduce the attacker's stamina damage while blocking by ${20}%. 
	

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your sword, activating this ability inflicts taunt for ${8}s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml:
For <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">8s</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">reduce</font> the incoming base <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">damage</font> from attackers by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> and reduce the attacker's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">stamina damage</font> while blocking by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font>. 
	

This ability has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">grit</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your sword, activating this ability inflicts taunt for ${8}s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)</font>

name: Final Countdown
description: If your health is above 50%, damage reduction is increased by ${20}%.
descriptionHtml: If your health is above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">50%</font>, damage reduction is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font>.

descriptionHtml: When Defender's Resolve ends, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">heal ${15}%</font> of your max health.

descriptionHtml: Reduce damage from all magical types by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>.
