name: Mighty Gavel
description:
An overhead leaping attack that crushes down on enemies, dealing ${170}% weapon damage.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your war hammer, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${4}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: An overhead leaping attack that crushes down on enemies, dealing ${170}% weapon damage. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your war hammer, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${4}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Summary Judgment
description: Increases Mighty Gavel damage by ${20}% to targets below ${30}% health.
descriptionHtml: Increases Mighty Gavel damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> to targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> health.

name: Impact Fracture
description: Increase stamina damage done by Mighty Gavel by ${25}%.
descriptionHtml: Increase <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">stamina damage</font> done by Mighty Gavel by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font>.

name: Expedite
description: After a successful Mighty Gavel attack, gain haste, increasing player's movement speed by ${30}% for ${3}s.
descriptionHtml: After a successful Mighty Gavel attack, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">haste</font>, increasing player's movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>.

name: Justice For All
description:
Mighty Gavel now has grit, its critical hit chance is increased by ${20}%, and hits will reduce all other war hammer cooldowns by ${10}%.  (Cooldown reduction only occurs once per attack). 

(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml:
Mighty Gavel now has <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">grit</font>, its critical hit chance is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font>, and hits will reduce all other war hammer cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282"> (Cooldown reduction only occurs once per attack)</font>. 

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

name: Wrecking Ball
description:
Strike the ground with your war hammer, dealing ${90}% weapon damage and knocking down your target. 

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml: Strike the ground with your war hammer, dealing ${90}% weapon damage and knocking down your target. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

name: Safety Measures
description: On a successful hit, gain fortify, increasing armor by ${20}% for ${7}s.
descriptionHtml: On a successful hit, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">fortify</font>, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${7}s</font>.

name: Breathing Room
description: Expands the range of Wrecking Ball to a 1.5m radius.
descriptionHtml: Expands the range of Wrecking Ball to a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">1.5m</font> radius.

name: Epitome Of Bonk!
description: Increase armor penetration by ${10}% for all war hammer basic attacks.
descriptionHtml: Increase armor penetration by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for all war hammer basic attacks.

name: Hammer Time
description: Gain empower on heavy attacks, increasing damage by ${20}% for ${4}s.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font> on heavy attacks, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}s</font>.

name: Exhaustive Attacks
description: All war hammer abilities apply exhaust, slowing target's stamina regeneration by ${20}% for ${5}s. (Does not stack.)
descriptionHtml: All war hammer abilities apply <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">exhaust</font>, slowing target's stamina regeneration by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Does not stack.)</font>

name: Hardened Steel
description:
Adds grit to war hammer heavy attacks. Also grants ${12}% damage reduction while grit is active. 

(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml:
Adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">grit</font> to war hammer heavy attacks. Also grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${12}%</font> damage reduction while <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">grit</font> is active. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

name: Contemption
description: Increase heavy attack damage by ${15}% against targets under ${30}% health.
descriptionHtml: Increase heavy attack damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> against targets under <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> health.

name: Quick Recovery
description: Heavy attacks that hit reduce cooldowns by 7%. (Max ${5} reductions per attack.)
descriptionHtml: Heavy attacks that hit reduce cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">7%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${5} reductions per attack.)</font>

name: Power Through Pain
description: Deal ${35}% extra damage for ${1}s after taking damage.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${35}%</font> extra damage for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}s</font> after taking damage.

name: Clear Out
description:
A wide swing that knocks back targets 4m and deals ${100}% weapon damage. 

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml: A wide swing that knocks back targets 4m and deals ${100}% weapon damage. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

name: Power Cleaner
description: Hitting a target with Clear Out grants fortify, increasing armor by ${20}% for ${4}s to all friendlies within ${6}m.
descriptionHtml: Hitting a target with Clear Out grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">fortify</font>, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}s</font> to all friendlies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${6}m</font>.

name: Clean and Refreshed
description: Clear Out's cooldown is reduced by ${5}% per enemy hit with the ability.
descriptionHtml: Clear Out's cooldown is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> per enemy hit with the ability.

name: Swing Away
description: Using Clear Out on a target grants haste, increasing movement speed by ${30}% for ${3}s.
descriptionHtml: Using Clear Out on a target grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">haste</font>, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>.

name: Shockwave
description:
Slam your war hammer into the ground, causing a ${3}m radius earthquake that deals ${60}% weapon damage, staggering and stunning all impacted targets for ${2}s. 

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your war hammer, this ability inflicts taunt for ${6}s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Slam your war hammer into the ground, causing a ${3}m radius earthquake that deals ${60}% weapon damage, staggering and stunning all impacted targets for ${2}s. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your war hammer, this ability inflicts taunt for ${6}s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Frailty
description: The trauma of the attack causes weaken, decreasing the damage dealt from the target's attacks by ${10}% for ${10}s.
descriptionHtml: The trauma of the attack causes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">weaken</font>, decreasing the damage dealt from the target's attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font>.

name: Meteoric Crater
description: Expands the range Shockwave to a ${4}m radius.
descriptionHtml: Expands the range Shockwave to a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}m</font> radius.

name: Path Of Destiny
description: A powerful ground strike that erupts a linear wave of energy in front of the player, dealing ${70}% weapon damage to all targets in its path.
descriptionHtml: A powerful ground strike that erupts a linear wave of energy in front of the player, dealing ${70}% weapon damage to all targets in its path.

name: Seismic Waves
description: Path of Destiny now staggers all targets in its path.
descriptionHtml: Path of Destiny now <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">staggers</font> all targets in its path.

name: Stimulated Reduction
description: Ability cooldown reduced by ${5}% for each enemy hit with Path of Destiny. (Max ${5} enemies.)
descriptionHtml: Ability cooldown reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> for each enemy hit with Path of Destiny. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${5} enemies.)</font>

name: Outnumbered
description: Increase armor by ${20}% if surrounded by 2 or more enemies within ${3}m.
descriptionHtml: Increase armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> if surrounded by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">2</font> or more enemies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}m</font>.

name: I Can Do This All Day
description: Reduce stamina consumption by ${30}% when blocking melee attacks.
descriptionHtml: Reduce stamina consumption by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> when blocking melee attacks.

name: Guarded Sprint
description: Reduce damage taken by ${10}% while sprinting.
descriptionHtml: Reduce damage taken by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> while sprinting.

name: Acceleration
description: Reduce war hammer cooldowns by ${7.000000000000001}% when using light attacks against targets with an active debuff. (Max ${5} reductions per attack.)
descriptionHtml: Reduce war hammer cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${7.000000000000001}%</font> when using light attacks against targets with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${5} reductions per attack.)</font>

name: Facilitated Expedition
description: After hitting a target with an active debuff, gain haste, increasing movement speed by ${15}% for ${3}s.
descriptionHtml: After hitting a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font>, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">haste</font>, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>.

name: Concussive Impact
description: Deal ${15}% increased damage against targets affected by war hammer debuffs.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> increased damage against targets affected by war hammer <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuffs</font>.

name: Prevailing Spirit
description: Heal for ${35}% of damage dealt when using a Crowd Crusher ability.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Heal</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${35}%</font> of damage dealt when using a Crowd Crusher ability.

name: Resurgence
description: After 2 light attacks with the war hammer, debuff durations on player are reduced by 25%. (Cooldown 5s.)
descriptionHtml: After <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">2</font> light attacks with the war hammer, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font> durations on player are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">25%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown 5s.)</font>

name: Aftershock
description: Whenever a target is affected by a crowd control effect, they are slowed by ${20}% for ${4}s.
descriptionHtml: Whenever a target is affected by a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">crowd control effect</font>, they are slowed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}s</font>.

name: Void Blade
description:
Summon a blade of Void energy that converts your basic attacks to melee. 

Tap Basic Attack to perform a quick slash that deals ${100}% weapon damage or hold to perform a thrust attack that deals ${150}% weapon damage. 

Both attacks inflict Disintegrate on successful hits, dealing ${5}% weapon damage per second and reducing target's armor by ${10}% for ${8}s and stacks up to ${3} times. 

Costs ${20} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Summon a blade of Void energy that converts your basic attacks to melee. Tap Basic Attack to perform a quick slash that deals ${100}% weapon damage or hold to perform a thrust attack that deals ${150}% weapon damage. Both attacks inflict Disintegrate on successful hits, dealing ${5}% weapon damage per second and reducing target's armor by ${10}% for ${8}s and stacks up to ${3} times. Costs ${20} Mana.

name: Fortified Blade
description: Gain fortify on start, increasing armor by ${20}% for ${5}s.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">fortify</font> on start, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

name: Vicious Void
description: +${10}% critical damage on Void Blade attacks.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">+${10}%</font> critical damage on Void Blade attacks.

name: Leeching Blade
description: Successful thrust attacks heal self for ${5}% weapon damage per Disintegrate stack on target. (Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)
descriptionHtml: Successful <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">thrust</font> attacks <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">heal</font> self for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> weapon damage per <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Disintegrate</font> stack on target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)</font>

name: Oblivion
description:
Summon a ${5}m radius circular rift of Void energy at your feet for 6s that deals ${30}% weapon damage per second to enemies and grants empower to self and friendlies, increasing damage by ${15}%.

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)

Costs ${30} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Summon a ${5}m radius circular rift of Void energy at your feet for 6s that deals ${30}% weapon damage per second to enemies and grants empower to self and friendlies, increasing damage by ${15}%. (This effect cannot be dispelled.) Costs ${30} Mana.

name: Withering Oblivion
description: Your attacks inflict weaken to targets inside the radius, reducing their damage by ${5}% for ${5}s per hit. (Stacks up to ${3} times.)
descriptionHtml: Your attacks inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">weaken</font> to targets inside the radius, reducing their damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font> per hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks up to ${3} times.)</font>

name: Invigorating Oblivion
description: +${25}% stamina regen rate for self and friendlies while inside the radius.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">+${25}%</font> stamina regen rate for self and friendlies while inside the radius.

name: Petrifying Scream
description:
Unleash a Void-infused scream, dealing ${70}% weapon damage, staggering and inflicting root to enemies 5m in front of you. Disables enemy movement for ${2}s.

Costs ${25} Mana.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your void gauntlet, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${4}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Unleash a Void-infused scream, dealing ${70}% weapon damage, staggering and inflicting root to enemies 5m in front of you. Disables enemy movement for ${2}s. Costs ${25} Mana. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your void gauntlet, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${4}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Refreshing Frailty
description: +${5}% cooldown reduction on all abilities when successfully hitting enemies afflicted by ${3} or more debuff stacks. (Stacks can be from different debuffs.) (Max ${5} hits per attack.)
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">+${5}%</font> cooldown reduction on all abilities when successfully hitting enemies afflicted by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}</font> or more <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font> stacks. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks can be from different debuffs.) (Max ${5} hits per attack.)</font>

name: Voidcaller
description:
On successful ability hit, gain a stack of Void Essence. At 6 stacks, consume all stacks and gain a ${3}m aura that heals self and friendlies for ${30}% weapon damage and deals ${30}% weapon damage per second to enemies within. ${5}s duration. 
(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.) 
(${20}s cooldown.)

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)
descriptionHtml: On successful ability hit, gain a stack of Void Essence. At 6 stacks, consume all stacks and gain a ${3}m aura that heals self and friendlies for ${30}% weapon damage and deals ${30}% weapon damage per second to enemies within. ${5}s duration. (Healing scales exclusively with Focus.) (${20}s cooldown.) (This effect cannot be dispelled.)

name: Orb of Decay
description:
Fire an unblockable orb that passes through enemies, deals ${90}% weapon damage and inflicts Disintegrate, dealing ${5}% weapon damage per second and reducing target's armor by ${10}% for ${8}s. (Stacks up to ${3} times.)

At max range, it transforms into a healing orb and returns, healing friendlies for ${20}% weapon damage per second for ${5}s. (Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)

Costs ${20} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Fire an unblockable orb that passes through enemies, deals ${90}% weapon damage and inflicts Disintegrate, dealing ${5}% weapon damage per second and reducing target's armor by ${10}% for ${8}s. (Stacks up to ${3} times.) At max range, it transforms into a healing orb and returns, healing friendlies for ${20}% weapon damage per second for ${5}s. (Healing scales exclusively with Focus.) Costs ${20} Mana.

name: Draining Orb
description: Gain ${5}% mana per enemy hit by the orb.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> mana per enemy hit by the orb.

name: Slowing Orb
description: The orb slows enemies already afflicted by any debuff, reducing their movement speed by ${30}% for ${3}s.
descriptionHtml: The orb <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">slows</font> enemies already afflicted by any <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font>, reducing their movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s.</font>

name: Detonating Orb
description: Press the ability input again to detonate the orb with a ${4}m explosion radius. Depending on the orb's phase, the explosion will either damage enemies for ${70}% weapon damage and apply a stack of Disintegrate or heal friendlies for ${70}% weapon damage. (Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)
descriptionHtml: Press the ability input again to detonate the orb with a ${4}m explosion radius. Depending on the orb's phase, the explosion will either damage enemies for ${70}% weapon damage and apply a stack of Disintegrate or heal friendlies for ${70}% weapon damage. (Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)

name: Baleful Tether
description:
Fire a projectile dealing ${100}% weapon damage that tethers you to an enemy for ${10}s, weakening it and empowering you by ${20}%. The tether ends early if the target moves beyond ${20}m.

Costs ${25} Mana.

(Tether remains active after weapon swap.)
descriptionHtml: Fire a projectile dealing ${100}% weapon damage that tethers you to an enemy for ${10}s, weakening it and empowering you by ${20}%. The tether ends early if the target moves beyond ${20}m. Costs ${25} Mana. (Tether remains active after weapon swap.)

name: Tethered Refresh
description: Successful hits against the tethered target reduce other Void Gauntlet cooldowns by ${5}%.
descriptionHtml: Successful hits against the tethered target reduce other Void Gauntlet cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font>.

name: Tethered Focus
description: +${200}% mana regeneration while the tether is active.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">+${200}%</font> mana regeneration while the tether is active.

name: Soul Eater
description: Heal for ${80}% weapon damage when the tether ends or is broken. (Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Heal</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${80}%</font> weapon damage when the tether ends or is broken. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)</font>

name: Essence Rupture
description:
Fire a projectile dealing ${100}% weapon damage that inflicts Essence Rupture for ${10}s, healing anyone that hits the target for ${20}% of the damage done. (Does not apply to damage-over-time or damage done to inanimate objects.)

Costs ${25} Mana.
descriptionHtml: Fire a projectile dealing ${100}% weapon damage that inflicts Essence Rupture for ${10}s, healing anyone that hits the target for ${20}% of the damage done. (Does not apply to damage-over-time or damage done to inanimate objects.) Costs ${25} Mana.

name: Invigorating Rupture
description: Allies additionally receive ${15} stamina when hitting the afflicted target.
descriptionHtml: Allies additionally receive <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}</font> stamina when hitting the afflicted target.

name: Overflowing Essence
description: Friendlies within ${4}m of the afflicted target are healed for ${80}% of your weapon damage when Essence Rupture ends or the target is killed. (Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)
descriptionHtml: Friendlies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}m</font> of the afflicted target are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">healed</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${80}%</font> of your weapon damage when Essence Rupture ends or the target is killed. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)</font>

name: Deadly Range
description: +${10}% damage on successful ranged basic attacks against targets with an active debuff.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">+${10}%</font> damage on successful ranged basic attacks against targets with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font>.

name: Fervent Thirst
description: +${5}% mana per successful ranged basic attack against targets afflicted by your Void Gauntlet debuffs.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">+${5}%</font> mana per successful ranged basic attack against targets afflicted by your Void Gauntlet <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuffs</font>.

name: Radiant Efficiency
description: Mana costs are reduced by ${25}% while above ${50}% mana.
descriptionHtml: Mana costs are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font> while above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> mana.

name: Cleansing Harvest
description: Using Harvest Essence for ${0.75}s removes ${1} debuff. (${3}s cooldown.)
descriptionHtml: Using <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Harvest Essence</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${0.75}s</font> removes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1} debuff</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${3}s cooldown.)</font>

name: Leeching Bolts
description: Healing from ranged heavy attacks is increased by an additional ${20}% of damage dealt.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Healing</font> from ranged heavy attacks is increased by an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> of damage dealt.

name: Extended Suffering
description: Successful ranged basic attacks increase the duration of non-crowd control debuffs you have applied by ${10}%.
descriptionHtml: Successful ranged basic attacks increase the duration of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">non-crowd control debuffs</font> you have applied by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>.

name: Mending Evasion
description: Dodging with full mana heals you for ${80}% weapon damage. (Healing scales exclusively with Focus.) (${20}s cooldown.)
descriptionHtml: Dodging with full mana <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">heals</font> you for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${80}%</font> weapon damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.) (${20}s cooldown.)</font>

name: Glimpse of the Void
description: Gain a stack of Void Essence per successful ability hit. At ${4} or more stacks, your next successful ranged heavy attack will instantly reset all Void Gauntlet cooldowns and remove all stacks. (${15}s cooldown.)
descriptionHtml: Gain a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Void Essence</font> per successful ability hit. At <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}</font> or more stacks, your next successful ranged heavy attack will instantly reset all Void Gauntlet <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldowns</font> and remove all stacks. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${15}s cooldown.)</font>

name: Claw Shot
description:
Shoot forward a four pronged claw attached to a chain from the muzzle. The projectile will travel up to 14m and cannot pull you upwards more than 3m. 
If it connects to an enemy it will deal ${40}% weapon damage and inflict root for ${1}s before quickly pulling you towards them. 

The pull can be canceled by any ability use or primary fire.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your blunderbuss, this ability inflicts taunt for ${4}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Shoot forward a four pronged claw attached to a chain from the muzzle. The projectile will travel up to 14m and cannot pull you upwards more than 3m. If it connects to an enemy it will deal ${40}% weapon damage and inflict root for ${1}s before quickly pulling you towards them. The pull can be canceled by any ability use or primary fire. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your blunderbuss, this ability inflicts taunt for ${4}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: In-and-Out
description: Upon usage, restore ${8} stamina every second for ${10}s.
descriptionHtml: Upon usage, restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${8}</font> stamina every second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font>.

name: Combat Readiness
description: Landing a pellet, even if blocked, lowers the cooldown of this ability by ${2}% each.
descriptionHtml: Landing a pellet, even if blocked, lowers the cooldown of this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}%</font> each.

name: Mobile Overload
description: Successful pulls will automatically grant 1 loaded ammunition. If you currently have 2 loaded ammunition this will exceed the max cap and grant a third.
descriptionHtml: Successful pulls will automatically grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">1</font> loaded ammunition. If you currently have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">2</font> loaded ammunition this will exceed the max cap and grant a third.

name: Net Shot
description:
Fire a large net out of the blunderbuss that deals ${70}% weapon damage and slows targets it hits by ${40}% for ${3}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

If standing still or moving backwards, the recoil from this attack will knock you further backwards.
If moving sideways or forwards, you will continue forward unhindered.
descriptionHtml: Fire a large net out of the blunderbuss that deals ${70}% weapon damage and slows targets it hits by ${40}% for ${3}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.) If standing still or moving backwards, the recoil from this attack will knock you further backwards. If moving sideways or forwards, you will continue forward unhindered.

name: Fast Hands
description: If Net Shot hits a target, reduce its cooldown by ${20}%.
descriptionHtml: If Net Shot hits a target, reduce its cooldown by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font>.

name: Apparatus
description: The net now inflicts a ${50}% slow that degrades to normal move speed over ${7}s.
descriptionHtml: The net now inflicts a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}% slow</font> that degrades to normal move speed over <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${7}s</font>.

name: Barbed Netting
description: Net Shot's initial hit is reduced to ${30}% weapon damage. However, it now deals ${35}% additional weapon damage as bleeding each second for ${3}s.
descriptionHtml: Net Shot's initial hit is reduced to ${30}% weapon damage. However, it now deals ${35}% additional weapon damage as bleeding each second for ${3}s.

name: Azoth Shrapnel Blast
description:
Fire 5 shots in a horizontal fan in front of you while pushing yourself backwards. Each shot will deal ${45}% weapon damage. 

(Every consecutive hit on the same target will deal ${20}% less damage than the previous hit.)
descriptionHtml: Fire 5 shots in a horizontal fan in front of you while pushing yourself backwards. Each shot will deal ${45}% weapon damage. (Every consecutive hit on the same target will deal ${20}% less damage than the previous hit.)

name: Reach
description: Increase the range of this attack from 12m to 16m.
descriptionHtml: Increase the range of this attack from <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">12m</font> to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">16m</font>.

name: Discord
description: Fire 4 additional pellets with each use of this ability.
descriptionHtml: Fire <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">4</font> additional pellets with each use of this ability.

name: Refresh
description: Each individual hit from this ability or from the blunderbuss primary fire will lower the cooldown of this ability by ${1.5}%.
descriptionHtml: Each individual hit from this ability or from the blunderbuss primary fire will lower the cooldown of this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1.5}%</font>.

name: Azoth Bomb
description: Fire a singular bomb down the center of the fan. This bomb will implant itself in the world and explode dealing ${100}% weapon damage in a 3m area after a 1s delay
descriptionHtml: Fire a singular bomb down the center of the fan. This bomb will implant itself in the world and explode dealing ${100}% weapon damage in a 3m area after a 1s delay

name: Deep Load
description: The last shot loaded into the blunderbuss will do ${15}% increased damage.
descriptionHtml: The last shot loaded into the blunderbuss will do <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> increased damage.

name: Fortifying Aggression
description: Successful hits within ${3}m grant fortify, increasing armor by ${10}% for ${2}s.
descriptionHtml: Successful hits within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}m</font> grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">fortify</font>, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font>.

name: Future Endeavors
description: Basic shots restore ${1} stamina per pellet hit.
descriptionHtml: Basic shots restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}</font> stamina per pellet hit.

name: Ramp
description: Reloads give you a damage boost of ${4}% for ${6}s. (Max ${4} stacks.)
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Reloads</font> give you a damage boost of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${6}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${4} stacks.)</font>

name: Run and Gun
description: Reloading gives you a ${40}% haste that lasts for ${1}s. (Haste increases movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Reloading</font> gives you a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${40}% haste</font> that lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

name: Unload
description: The next shot fired within ${6}s after triggering an ability will have 8 pellets instead of 6.
descriptionHtml: The next shot fired within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${6}s</font> after triggering an ability will have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">8</font> pellets instead of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">6</font>.

name: Splitting Grenade
description:
Shoot a grenade out of the blunderbuss that can bounce up to 4 times. 
The Splitting Grenade will detonate after 1.5s but can be detonated early by reactivating its ability key within this time period. 

Upon detonation, it will create 3 mini grenades that will disperse and explode 1s after landing, dealing ${85}% weapon damage in a 3m radius area. 

(Each successive grenade hit against the same target deals ${40}% less base damage.)
descriptionHtml: Shoot a grenade out of the blunderbuss that can bounce up to 4 times. The Splitting Grenade will detonate after 1.5s but can be detonated early by reactivating its ability key within this time period. Upon detonation, it will create 3 mini grenades that will disperse and explode 1s after landing, dealing ${85}% weapon damage in a 3m radius area. (Each successive grenade hit against the same target deals ${40}% less base damage.)

name: Soften
description: Deal ${25}% increased damage to targets greater than ${50}% health.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font> increased damage to targets greater than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> health.

name: Delayed Escape
description: Any grenade hit grants haste, increasing movement speed by ${20}% for ${3}s. (Multiple hits will refresh the duration.)
descriptionHtml: Any grenade hit grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">haste</font>, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Multiple hits will refresh the duration.)</font>

name: Incendiary Bursts
description: Splitting Grenade explosions inflict burn on hit, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second for ${10}s. (Stacks up to ${3} times.)
descriptionHtml: Splitting Grenade explosions inflict burn on hit, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second for ${10}s. (Stacks up to ${3} times.)

name: Mortar Charge
description:
Load the blunderbuss with heavy canisters. For the next 15s or 3 shots, shots will no longer fire multiple pellets but instead will fire a heavy, fast diving, mortar-style canister that causes a tall explosion upon impact, dealing ${100}% weapon damage in a 3m area. 

If the target is ${10}m away or further, they will take ${35}% increased damage from the mortar.
descriptionHtml: Load the blunderbuss with heavy canisters. For the next 15s or 3 shots, shots will no longer fire multiple pellets but instead will fire a heavy, fast diving, mortar-style canister that causes a tall explosion upon impact, dealing ${100}% weapon damage in a 3m area. If the target is ${10}m away or further, they will take ${35}% increased damage from the mortar.

name: Steady
description: Each hit grants ${7} stamina.
descriptionHtml: Each hit grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${7}</font> stamina.

name: Freedom
description: Firing grants a ${50}% haste for ${2}s. (Haste increases movement speed.)
descriptionHtml: Firing grants a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>

name: Streak
description: Gain an extra canister, you can now fire up to 4 shots.
descriptionHtml: Gain an extra canister, you can now fire up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">4</font> shots.

name: Blast Shot
description:
Blast immense wind out of the blunderbuss knocking down any target immediately in front of you. Blast Shot deals ${50}% weapon damage. 

This ability has grit. 

(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your blunderbuss, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${4}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Blast immense wind out of the blunderbuss knocking down any target immediately in front of you. Blast Shot deals ${50}% weapon damage. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your blunderbuss, hits with this ability inflict taunt for ${4}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Preparation
description: Blast Shot applies rend, decreasing armor of all targets affected by this ability by ${10}% for ${6}s.
descriptionHtml: Blast Shot applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">rend</font>, decreasing armor of all targets affected by this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${6}s</font>.

name: Lingering Flow
description:
The area 10m in front of you remains influenced by wind for the next ${8}s. You and your allies gain a ${25}% move speed bonus while in the area.

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)
descriptionHtml:
The area <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">10m</font> in front of you remains influenced by wind for the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${8}s</font>. You and your allies gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font> move speed bonus while in the area.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)</font>

name: Artillery
description: Direct damage from abilities is increased by ${15}% if the victim is ${10}m or further away.
descriptionHtml: Direct damage from abilities is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> if the victim is <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}m</font> or further away.

name: Buckshot
description: Deal ${10}% increased damage to any target as long as you have not damaged them in the last ${8}s.
descriptionHtml: Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> increased damage to any target as long as you have not damaged them in the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${8}s</font>.

name: Future Planning
description: Using an ability reduces all other ability cooldowns by ${4}%.
descriptionHtml: Using an ability reduces all other ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}%</font>.

name: Bite Back
description: Every pellet that is a headshot reduces all cooldowns by ${0.5}%.
descriptionHtml: Every pellet that is a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">headshot</font> reduces all cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${0.5}%</font>.

name: Extended Chamber
description: Holding onto 2 loaded ammunition for ${2}s after a reload will load a 3rd active ammunition.
descriptionHtml: Holding onto <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">2</font> loaded ammunition for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font> after a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">reload</font> will load a 3rd active ammunition.

name: On a Roll
description: Triggering an ability grants a ${3}% fortify for ${10}s. (Stacks up to ${5} times.) (Fortify increases armor)
descriptionHtml: Triggering an ability grants a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks up to ${5} times.) (Fortify increases armor)</font>

name: Last Chance
description: Whenever you take a hit and your health is below ${50}% gain fortify, increasing armor by ${30}% for ${4}s. (${30}s cooldown)
descriptionHtml: Whenever you take a hit and your health is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">fortify</font>, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${30}s cooldown)</font>

name: Double Down
description: Once every ${30}s, your next ability used will have its cooldown reduced by ${50}%.
descriptionHtml: Once every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}s</font>, your next ability used will have its cooldown reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font>.

name: Relentless Rush
description:
Dash through foes while spinning and apply a ${20}%  slow for ${4}s on hit.

First Hit: ${110.00000000000001}% weapon damage.
Second Hit: ${120}% weapon damage. (This attack cannot backstab.) 

Enter onslaught stance when this ability ends.
descriptionHtml: Dash through foes while spinning and apply a ${20}% slow for ${4}s on hit. First Hit: ${110.00000000000001}% weapon damage. Second Hit: ${120}% weapon damage. (This attack cannot backstab.) Enter onslaught stance when this ability ends.

name: Relentless Power
description: Gain ${10}%   empower for ${10}s after hitting a target with Relentless Rush.
descriptionHtml: Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}% </font>  <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font> after hitting a target with Relentless Rush.

name: Adaptive Rush
description:
In onslaught stance, Relentless Rush applies root to targets it hits for ${0.5}s.

In defiant stance, Relentless Rush heals for ${15}% of its damage. (Max ${5} hits.)
descriptionHtml:
In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">onslaught stance</font>, Relentless Rush applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">root</font> to targets it hits for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${0.5}s</font>.

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">defiant stance</font>, Relentless Rush <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">heals</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> of its damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${5} hits.)</font>

name: Relentless Refresh
description: Reduces ability cooldown by ${50}% when you kill a foe. (This effect has a ${5}s cooldown.)
descriptionHtml: Reduces ability <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldown</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> when you kill a foe. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a ${5}s cooldown.)</font>

name: Crosscut
description:
Slash 3 times in a quick sequence.

First Hit: ${110.00000000000001}% weapon damage.
Second Hit: ${130}% weapon damage.
Third Hit: ${160}% weapon damage.

Enter onslaught stance when the third attack of this ability ends.
descriptionHtml: Slash 3 times in a quick sequence. First Hit: ${110.00000000000001}% weapon damage. Second Hit: ${130}% weapon damage. Third Hit: ${160}% weapon damage. Enter onslaught stance when the third attack of this ability ends.

name: Unstoppable Cuts
description:
Gain grit while performing Crosscut.

(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

In defiant stance, gain stun immunity while performing Crosscut.
descriptionHtml:
Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">grit</font> while performing Crosscut.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">defiant stance</font>, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">stun immunity</font> while performing Crosscut.

name: Cross Execution
description:
Base damage of the final strike is increased by ${50}% if the target is below ${50}% health.

In onslaught stance, this threshold is increased to ${75}% instead.
descriptionHtml:
Base damage of the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">final strike</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> if the target is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> health.

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">onslaught stance</font>, this threshold is increased to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${75}%</font> instead.

name: Skyward Slash
description:
Swing up in a brutal arc, staggering your target, dealing ${50}% weapon damage and applying 2 stacks of ${5}%  rend for ${10}s. (Max ${3} stacks.)

In onslaught stance apply 1 additional rend.

Enter onslaught stance when the upward arc of this ability ends.
descriptionHtml: Swing up in a brutal arc, staggering your target, dealing ${50}% weapon damage and applying 2 stacks of ${5}% rend for ${10}s. (Max ${3} stacks.) In onslaught stance apply 1 additional rend. Enter onslaught stance when the upward arc of this ability ends.

name: Skyfall Sword
description: Add a followup attack that deals ${140}% weapon damage by activating the skill again or using a basic attack.
descriptionHtml: Add a followup attack that deals ${140}% weapon damage by activating the skill again or using a basic attack.

name: Sickening Slash
description:
The first attack applies disease which reduces healing by ${20}% for ${10}s.

The followup attack strikes all foes within a 3m radius.
descriptionHtml:
The <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">first attack</font> applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">disease</font> which reduces healing by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font>.

The <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">followup attack</font> strikes all foes within a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">3m</font> radius.

name: Giant Slayer
description: Increases base attack damage by ${15}% when attacking foes that are above ${90}% health.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Increases</font> base attack damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> when attacking foes that are above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${90}%</font> health.

name: Heavy Blade
description: Charged heavy attacks have ${15}% armor penetration.
descriptionHtml: Charged heavy attacks have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> armor penetration.

name: Swift Onslaught
description: Gain a ${20}%  haste for ${5}s when hitting a target with a Onslaught tree ability. (This effect has a ${10}s cooldown.)
descriptionHtml: Gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font> when hitting a target with a Onslaught tree ability. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a ${10}s cooldown.)</font>

name: Keen Posture
description: After gaining onslaught stance, your next attack within ${5}s has a ${100}% increased critical hit chance.
descriptionHtml: After gaining <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">onslaught stance</font>, your next attack within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font> has a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${100}%</font> increased <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">critical hit chance</font>.

name: Aggressive Shift
description: Enter onslaught stance by hitting with a charged heavy attack. \n\n(This effect occurs even if the attack is blocked but will not renew onslaught stance if it is already active.)
descriptionHtml: Enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">onslaught stance</font> by hitting with a charged heavy attack. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(This effect occurs even if the attack is blocked but will not renew onslaught stance if it is already active.)</font>

name: Critical Comeback
description: Become energized by landing a critical hit and regain ${5} stamina and ${5}% base health per second for ${5}s. (This effect has a ${10}s cooldown.)
descriptionHtml: Become <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">energized</font> by landing a critical hit and regain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5} stamina</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}% base health</font> per second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a ${10}s cooldown.)</font>

name: Crush the Weak
description: Critical hit chance is increased by ${10}% when attacking foes with an active debuff.
descriptionHtml: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Critical hit chance</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> when attacking foes with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuff</font>.

name: Step and Strike
description:
After dodging, gain a ${10}%  empower for the next ${3} hits within ${10}s. (This effect only occurs when in combat.)

Attacks empowered by this effect restore ${10} stamina on hit.
descriptionHtml:
After dodging, gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font> for the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}</font> hits within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect only occurs when in combat.)</font>

Attacks empowered by this effect restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10} stamina</font> on hit.

name: Unrelenting Onslaught
description:
Hitting foes reduces greatsword cooldowns:
 Light attack: ${2}%
 Charged heavy attack: ${10}% 

(Cooldown reduction only occurs once per attack.)
descriptionHtml:
Hitting foes reduces greatsword <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldowns</font>:
 Light attack: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}%</font>
 Charged heavy attack: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(Cooldown reduction only occurs once per attack.)</font>

name: Calamity Counter
description:
Block for 2s while reducing block stamina damage taken by ${90}%, then unleash a counterattack that strikes all foes within a 4m radius.

 No Blocks: ${80}% weapon damage.
 1 Block: ${80}% weapon damage and staggers.
 2 Blocks: ${80}% weapon damage and staggers longer.
 3 Blocks: ${80}% weapon damage and causes a knockback.

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Reactivate this ability or use basic attack to counterattack earlier.

Enter defiant stance when the counterattack of this ability ends.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your greatsword, activating this ability inflicts taunt for ${8}s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Block for 2s while reducing block stamina damage taken by ${90}%, then unleash a counterattack that strikes all foes within a 4m radius. No Blocks: ${80}% weapon damage. 1 Block: ${80}% weapon damage and staggers. 2 Blocks: ${80}% weapon damage and staggers longer. 3 Blocks: ${80}% weapon damage and causes a knockback. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) Reactivate this ability or use basic attack to counterattack earlier. Enter defiant stance when the counterattack of this ability ends. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your greatsword, activating this ability inflicts taunt for ${8}s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Jagged Counter
description: Counter attacks inflict bleeding for ${6}s for each power level. Each stack deals ${5}% weapon damage every second. (Max ${5} stacks.)
descriptionHtml: Counter attacks inflict bleeding for ${6}s for each power level. Each stack deals ${5}% weapon damage every second. (Max ${5} stacks.)

name: Critical Calamity
description:
Counter attack crit chance is increased by ${25}%.

In onslaught stance, the counter attack gains an additional ${25}% critical hit chance.

In defiant stance, the counter attack heals for ${20}% of its damage. (Max ${5} hits.)
descriptionHtml:
Counter attack <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">crit chance</font> is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font>.

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">onslaught stance</font>, the counter attack gains an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font> critical hit chance.

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">defiant stance</font>, the counter attack <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">heals</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> of its damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${5} hits.)</font>

name: Steadfast Strike
description:
Stab your greatsword forward to impale your foes, then pull back to rip the blade out. Restores ${20} stamina on each hit.

First Hit: ${40}% weapon damage and staggers.
Second Hit: ${120}% weapon damage and pulls target ${1.5}m towards you.

This ability generates ${150}%  threat.

Enter defiant stance after the second attack of this ability ends.
descriptionHtml: Stab your greatsword forward to impale your foes, then pull back to rip the blade out. Restores ${20} stamina on each hit. First Hit: ${40}% weapon damage and staggers. Second Hit: ${120}% weapon damage and pulls target ${1.5}m towards you. This ability generates ${150}% threat. Enter defiant stance after the second attack of this ability ends.

name: Steadfast Recovery
description:
If the first strike of Steadfast Strike hits, you are healed for ${50}% weapon damage.

In defiant stance, the first strike also inflicts 2 stacks of bleeding for ${6}s which deals ${5}% weapon damage every second. (Max ${5} stacks.)
descriptionHtml: If the first strike of Steadfast Strike hits, you are healed for ${50}% weapon damage. In defiant stance, the first strike also inflicts 2 stacks of bleeding for ${6}s which deals ${5}% weapon damage every second. (Max ${5} stacks.)

name: Steadfast Refresh
description: If the second strike of Steadfast Strike hits, reduce the cooldown of all other greatsword abilities by ${20}%.
descriptionHtml: If the second strike of Steadfast Strike hits, reduce the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cooldown</font> of all other greatsword abilities by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font>.

name: Roaring Rupture
description:
Stab the ground and send out a shockwave with a ${4}m radius that deals ${120}% weapon damage. Gain ${10}%  fortify for ${7}s for each foe hit. (Max ${3} stacks.)

This ability generates ${200}%  threat and has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Enter defiant stance when this ability ends.

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your greatsword, this ability inflicts taunt for ${8}s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Stab the ground and send out a shockwave with a ${4}m radius that deals ${120}% weapon damage. Gain ${10}% fortify for ${7}s for each foe hit. (Max ${3} stacks.) This ability generates ${200}% threat and has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) Enter defiant stance when this ability ends. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your greatsword, this ability inflicts taunt for ${8}s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Purifying Roar
description: Cleanse ${2}  debuffs. after using Roaring Rupture.
descriptionHtml: Cleanse <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2} </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuffs.</font> after using Roaring Rupture.

name: Adaptive Rupture
description:
In defiant stance, the shockwave pushes foes outward ${3}m.

In onslaught stance, the shockwave pulls foes ${3}m towards you.
descriptionHtml:
In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">defiant stance</font>, the shockwave <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">pushes</font> foes outward <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}m</font>.

In <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">onslaught stance</font>, the shockwave <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">pulls</font> foes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}m</font> towards you.

name: Intimidating Roar
description: The shockwave applies a ${10}%  weaken for ${10}s on hit. Additionally, after a successful hit become uninterruptible for ${5}s.
descriptionHtml: The shockwave applies a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">weaken</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font> on hit. Additionally, after a successful hit become <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">uninterruptible</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

name: Perfect Vigilance
description: If you are hit while at full health, reduce the damage taken by ${20}% then gain a ${20}%  fortify for ${3}s. (This effect has a ${20}s cooldown.)
descriptionHtml: If you are hit while at full health, reduce the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">damage taken</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> then gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a ${20}s cooldown.)</font>

name: Cleansing Chain
description: Hitting with the final attack of the greatsword chain reduces the duration of debuffs on you by ${10}%. (This effect has a ${5}s cooldown.)
descriptionHtml: Hitting with the final attack of the greatsword chain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">reduces</font> the duration of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">debuffs</font> on you by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a ${5}s cooldown.)</font>

name: Blade Honing
description: Base damage is increased by ${3}% for each greatsword buff on you. (Max ${4} buffs.)
descriptionHtml: Base damage is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}%</font> for each greatsword <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">buff</font> on you. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${4} buffs.)</font>

name: Wary Posture
description:
After gaining defiant stance you will also gain fortify, increasing your armor by ${25}% for the next hit taken within ${5}s.

(Does not apply to damage from debuffs.)
descriptionHtml:
After gaining <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">defiant stance</font> you will also gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">fortify</font>, increasing your armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font> for the next hit taken within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

(Does not apply to damage from debuffs.)

name: Guarded Shift
description:
Blocking for ${2}s causes you to enter defiant stance. 

(You must be in combat for this effect to activate. This effect will not renew defiant stance if it is already active.)
descriptionHtml:
Blocking for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font> causes you to enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">defiant stance</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(You must be in combat for this effect to activate. This effect will not renew defiant stance if it is already active.)</font>

name: Unflinching Blade
description: Charged heavy attacks have grit and inflict bleeding for ${6}s dealing ${5}% weapon damage every second. (Max ${5} stacks.)
descriptionHtml: Charged heavy attacks have grit and inflict bleeding for ${6}s dealing ${5}% weapon damage every second. (Max ${5} stacks.)

name: Arrow Deflection
description:
You can now block 100% of the ranged attack damage while using a greatsword. 

Additionally, you also reduce the stamina damage from all attacks while blocking by ${10}%.
descriptionHtml:
You can now block <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">100%</font> of the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">ranged</font> attack damage while using a greatsword. 

Additionally, you also reduce the stamina damage from all attacks while blocking by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>.

name: Faultless Defender
description:
Reduce the attackers stamina damage dealt by ${50}% when blocking attacks just after raising your guard or with guard point. 

Blocking attacks within this window inflicts a ${5}%  rend for ${10}s against melee attackers. (Max ${3} stacks.)
descriptionHtml:
Reduce the attackers <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">stamina damage</font> dealt by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> when blocking attacks just after raising your guard or with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">guard point</font>. 

Blocking attacks within this window inflicts a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">rend</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font> against melee attackers. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${3} stacks.)</font>

name: Undying Defiance
description:
Heal for ${5}% of the damage from attacks.

Attacking within ${3}s of blocking an attack heals for ${15}% of the damage dealt instead.
descriptionHtml:
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Heal</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> of the damage from attacks.

Attacking within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font> of blocking an attack <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">heals</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> of the damage dealt instead.

name: Path of Onslaught
description:
After completing any ability in the Onslaught tree, enter onslaught stance for ${10}s.

Onslaught stance has the following properties:
 Outgoing Damage Increased: ${15}%
 Damage Taken Increased: ${15}%
 Quick Charge: Heavy attacks charge 50% faster but consume ${10} stamina each

(Entering defiant stance or switching weapons will immediately end onslaught stance.)
descriptionHtml:
After completing any ability in the Onslaught tree, enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">onslaught stance</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font>.

Onslaught stance has the following properties:
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Outgoing Damage</font> Increased: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font>
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Damage Taken</font> Increased: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font>
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Quick Charge</font>: Heavy attacks charge <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">50% faster</font> but consume <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10} stamina</font> each

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Entering defiant stance or switching weapons will immediately end onslaught stance.)</font>

name: Path of Defiance
description:
After completing any ability in the Defiance tree, enter defiant stance for ${10}s.

Defiant stance has the following properties:
 Damage Taken Reduced: ${-15}%
 Outgoing Damage Reduced: ${-15}%
 Guard Point: Block incoming attacks while charging heavy attacks 

(Entering onslaught stance or switching weapons will immediately end defiant stance.)
descriptionHtml:
After completing any ability in the Defiance tree, enter <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">defiant stance</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}s</font>.

Defiant stance has the following properties:
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Damage Taken</font> Reduced: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${-15}%</font>
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Outgoing Damage</font> Reduced: <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${-15}%</font>
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Guard Point</font>: Block incoming attacks while charging heavy attacks <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">
