(Entering onslaught stance or switching weapons will immediately end defiant stance.)</font>

name: Arcane Smite
description:
Leap forward and strike the ground with arcane force dealing ${130}% weapon damage to all targets within ${2.7}m of the impact. 
	

Leave behind a hazardous area at the impact point that inflicts a stack of Impairment for ${6}s to all targets that enter.
	

Impairment deals ${10}%weapon damage per second and inflicts weaken, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks)
	

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml: Leap forward and strike the ground with arcane force dealing ${130}% weapon damage to all targets within ${2.7}m of the impact. Leave behind a hazardous area at the impact point that inflicts a stack of Impairment for ${6}s to all targets that enter. Impairment deals ${10}%weapon damage per second and inflicts weaken, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks) This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

name: Epic Flail
description: Smite hits reduce its own cooldown by ${5}% per target hit. (Max ${5} targets)
descriptionHtml: Smite hits reduce its own cooldown by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> per target hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${5} targets)</font>

name: Ironclad Superiority
description:
Grants a bonus based on what shield type is equipped:
	

 Round Shield - Smite deals ${20}% more base weapon damage.
	
 Kite Shield - Smite will now stagger targets hit, but damage is reduced to ${90}% weapon damage.
	
 Tower Shield - Gain ${30}%  fortfy for ${6}s when smite is activated. (Fortify increases armor)
descriptionHtml: Grants a bonus based on what shield type is equipped: Round Shield - Smite deals ${20}% more base weapon damage. Kite Shield - Smite will now stagger targets hit, but damage is reduced to ${90}% weapon damage. Tower Shield - Gain ${30}% fortfy for ${6}s when smite is activated. (Fortify increases armor)

name: Deflecting Frailty
description:
Allies that enter the hazardous area obtain Deflecting Frailty for ${3}s, which when attacked will inflict a stacking weaken to enemy attackers when hit, reducing the enemy's damage dealt by ${5}% per stack for ${5}s. (Max ${5} stacks)
	

Additionally while the effect is active, when allies are hit, they gain ${10}% lifesteal for  ${3}s. 

(Deflecting Frailty scales with Focus, increasing its duration to up to ${12} seconds.)
descriptionHtml:
Allies that enter the hazardous area obtain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Deflecting Frailty</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>, which when attacked will inflict a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">stacking weaken</font> to enemy attackers when hit, reducing the enemy's damage dealt by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> per stack for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${5} stacks)</font>
	

Additionally while the effect is active, when allies are hit, they gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}% lifesteal for </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>. 

(Deflecting Frailty scales with Focus, increasing its duration to up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${12}</font> seconds.)

name: Arcane Vortex
description:
Swirl the flail above the player's head dealing 4 rapid hits of ${75}% weapon damage in a 3m radius around the player. 
	

After the first spin is completed, trigger a ${3}m blast of energy granting ${10}% empower for ${5}s to all allies inside the radius.
	

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml: Swirl the flail above the player's head dealing 4 rapid hits of ${75}% weapon damage in a 3m radius around the player. After the first spin is completed, trigger a ${3}m blast of energy granting ${10}% empower for ${5}s to all allies inside the radius. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

name: Flailbird
description: Hitting targets ${4} times with arcane vortex will inflict them with root, immobilizing them for ${1}s.
descriptionHtml: Hitting targets <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}</font> times with arcane vortex will inflict them with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">root</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">immobilizing</font> them for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}s</font>.

name: Accelerated Advantage
description:
Hitting a target with arcane vortex grants a stacking haste on self, increasing movement speed by ${7.000000000000001}% for ${7}s. (Max ${4} stacks) 
	

Allies within the radius of the attack are granted a ${25}%  haste for ${5}s.
descriptionHtml:
Hitting a target with arcane vortex grants a stacking <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">haste</font> on self, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${7.000000000000001}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${7}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${4} stacks)</font> 
	

Allies within the radius of the attack are granted a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

name: Flailing Stability
description:
All allies within ${3}m of player during the arcane vortex are cleansed of crowd control status effects (Root, Stun, Slow) and are immune to them for ${1} seconds. 
	

All allies inside are also healed for ${65}% weapon damage. (Healing scales exclusively with Focus) 

(Crowd Control Immunity scales with Focus, increasing its duration to up to ${5} seconds.)
descriptionHtml:
All allies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}m</font> of player during the arcane vortex are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">cleansed</font> of crowd control status effects (Root, Stun, Slow) and are immune to them for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}</font> seconds. 
	

All allies inside are also <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">healed</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${65}%</font> weapon damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus)</font> 

(Crowd Control Immunity scales with Focus, increasing its duration to up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}</font> seconds.)

name: Arcane Eruption
description:
Drag the head of the flail against the ground causing an eruption of arcane energy in front of the player, dealing ${120}% weapon damage and inflicting two stacks of Impairment for ${6}s to all targets hit.
	

Automatically follow up with an additional melee attack that deals ${150}% weapon damage.
	

Impairment deals ${10}% weapon damage per second and inflicts weaken, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks)
descriptionHtml: Drag the head of the flail against the ground causing an eruption of arcane energy in front of the player, dealing ${120}% weapon damage and inflicting two stacks of Impairment for ${6}s to all targets hit. Automatically follow up with an additional melee attack that deals ${150}% weapon damage. Impairment deals ${10}% weapon damage per second and inflicts weaken, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks)

name: Crippling Strike
description: Targets hit with the first attack of burst are slowed, reducing their movement speed by ${40}% for ${3}s.
descriptionHtml: Targets hit with the first attack of burst are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">slowed</font>, reducing their movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${40}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>.

name: Debilitating Extension
description: The follow up attack extends the duration of all debilitate status effects (Rend, Weaken, Exhaust, Disease) on the target by ${30}%.
descriptionHtml: The follow up attack extends the duration of all debilitate status effects (Rend, Weaken, Exhaust, Disease) on the target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font>.

name: Supportive Blessing
description:
The follow up attack consumes one stack of Impairment on the target hit, triggering a chain that will bounce up to ${4} times to allies within ${6}m of player, granting ${130}% of its total damage as health to each ally it chains to, and ${50}% of its total damage to self. 

(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)
descriptionHtml:
The follow up attack <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">consumes</font> one stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Impairment</font> on the target hit, triggering a chain that will bounce up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}</font> times to allies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${6}m</font> of player, granting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${130}%</font> of its total damage as <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">health</font> to each ally it chains to, and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> of its total damage to self. 

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)</font>

name: Oppressive Advantage
description:
Abilities and Heavy attack hits against targets with less than ${50}% health, increase incoming healing by ${5}% and gain ${10}%  haste to self for ${3}s. 
(Incoming healing increase scales with Focus, increasing its power to up to ${20}%) 
	

(Haste increases movement speed)
descriptionHtml:
Abilities and Heavy attack hits against targets with less than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> health, increase incoming healing by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> and gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold"> haste</font> to self for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>. 
(Incoming healing increase scales with Focus, increasing its power to up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font>) 
	

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed)</font>

name: Weighted Superiority
description:
Grants Cooldown Reduction based on actions performed in different equip loads:
	

 Heavy - ${1}% cooldown reduction when hit or blocking a hit. (${0.5}s cooldown) 
	
 Medium - 
	${5}% cooldown reduction when dodging an attack. (${1}s cooldown) 
	
 Light - ${1}% cooldown reduction when hitting a target. (${1}s cooldown)
descriptionHtml:
Grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Cooldown Reduction</font> based on actions performed in different <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">equip loads</font>:
	

 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Heavy</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}%</font> cooldown reduction when hit or blocking a hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${0.5}s cooldown)</font> 
	
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Medium</font> - 
	<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font> cooldown reduction when dodging an attack. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${1}s cooldown)</font> 
	
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Light</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}%</font> cooldown reduction when hitting a target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${1}s cooldown)</font>

name: Happy Flails
description: Hitting a target with a basic attack within ${3}s of using an ability will inflict exhaust, reducing stamina regen rate by ${15}% for ${5}s.
descriptionHtml: Hitting a target with a basic attack within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font> of using an ability will inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">exhaust</font>, reducing stamina regen rate by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.

name: Spiky Impairment
description:
Being hit or blocking a hit from a melee attack while above ${90}% health inflicts a stack of Impairment for ${6}s on the attacker, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second and inflicting weaken, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks) 

(${5}s cooldown)
descriptionHtml: Being hit or blocking a hit from a melee attack while above ${90}% health inflicts a stack of Impairment for ${6}s on the attacker, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second and inflicting weaken, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks) (${5}s cooldown)

name: Vital Embrace
description:
While at or below ${50}% health, all flail attacks grant ${3}% lifesteal while attacking targets. (Max ${3} targets)
	

While above ${50}% health, all flail attacks extend the duration of damage over time effects on targets by ${7.000000000000001}%.
descriptionHtml:
While at or below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> health, all flail attacks grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}%</font> lifesteal while attacking targets. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max ${3} targets)</font>
	

While above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> health, all flail attacks extend the duration of damage over time effects on targets by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${7.000000000000001}%</font>.

name: Leader of the Pack
description:
When no allies are within ${5}m, all flail attacks deal ${10}% more base damage.
	

When 1 or more allies are within ${5}m, they gain empower, increasing their damage dealt by ${5}%.
descriptionHtml:
When no allies are within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}m</font>, all flail attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> more base damage.
	

When 1 or more allies are within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}m</font>, they gain empower, increasing their damage dealt by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}%</font>.

name: Better Together
description:
While within ${4}m of ${1} or more allies, grant passive healing to self and all allies that heals for ${16}% weapon damage every ${3} seconds. 

(Healing scales exclusively with Focus)
descriptionHtml:
While within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}m</font> of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${1}</font> or more allies, grant passive <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">healing</font> to self and all allies that heals for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${16}%</font> weapon damage every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}</font> seconds. 

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus)</font>

name: Barrage
description:
Sprint forward up to 10m. Upon reactivating the ability, pressing basic attack, or reaching the end of the sprint, leap forward up to an additional 6m and slam to the ground, dealing ${30}% weapon damage to targets in range of the flail during the leap and ${80}% weapon damage upon landing, staggering targets on impact.
	

(Character collision is disabled while sprinting forward)
	

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your Flail, this ability inflicts taunt for ${6}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Sprint forward up to 10m. Upon reactivating the ability, pressing basic attack, or reaching the end of the sprint, leap forward up to an additional 6m and slam to the ground, dealing ${30}% weapon damage to targets in range of the flail during the leap and ${80}% weapon damage upon landing, staggering targets on impact. (Character collision is disabled while sprinting forward) Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your Flail, this ability inflicts taunt for ${6}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Defensive Rush
description:
Hitting a target with any of barrage's hits will grant a ${30}% fortify. The fortify has a ${2}s duration, and every hit extends the duration of the status effect by ${2}s to a max of ${8}s.
	

(Moving through targets with the Bulldoze upgrade will also extend the duration of the effect)
descriptionHtml:
Hitting a target with any of barrage's hits will grant a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}% fortify</font>. The fortify has a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font> duration, and every hit extends the duration of the status effect by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${2}s</font> to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${8}s</font>.
	

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Moving through targets with the Bulldoze upgrade will also extend the duration of the effect)</font>

name: Abiding Superiority
description:
Grants a bonus to Barrage based on what shield type is equipped:
	

 Round Shield - Barrage hits for ${30}% more base weapon damage.
	
 Kite Shield - Barrage hits inflict ${20}%  slow for 
	${4}s. (This will also slow targets moved through with the Bulldoze upgrade)
	
 Tower Shield - Barrage gains grit while active.
	

(Slow reduces movement speed) 
	
(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
descriptionHtml:
Grants a bonus to Barrage based on what <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">shield type</font> is equipped:
	

 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Round Shield</font> - Barrage hits for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font> more base weapon damage.
	
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Kite Shield</font> - Barrage hits inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold"> slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">
	${4}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This will also slow targets moved through with the Bulldoze upgrade)</font>
	
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Tower Shield</font> - Barrage gains <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">grit</font> while active.
	

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces movement speed)</font> 
	
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>

name: Bulldoze
description: Barrage can now block attacks while charging forward without consuming stamina, and will push all enemies moved through to the side. \n\n(This will also cause the targets moved through to be taunted if using a carnelian gem)
descriptionHtml: Barrage can now <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">block</font> attacks while charging forward without consuming stamina, and will <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">push</font> all enemies moved through to the side. \n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This will also cause the targets moved through to be taunted if using a carnelian gem)</font>

name: Flailure to Launch
description: Barrage's attack now triggers a ${2.5}m blast of energy around the target on hit, dealing ${35}% weapon damage to all nearby targets, and granting fortify to all allies within the radius, increasing armor by ${20}% for ${8}s.
descriptionHtml: Barrage's attack now triggers a ${2.5}m blast of energy around the target on hit, dealing ${35}% weapon damage to all nearby targets, and granting fortify to all allies within the radius, increasing armor by ${20}% for ${8}s.

name: Trip
description: Swing the Flail forward latching onto a target dealing ${50}% weapon damage and knocking them to the ground.
descriptionHtml: Swing the Flail forward latching onto a target dealing ${50}% weapon damage and knocking them to the ground.

name: Flailing Duration
description: Tripping a target applies a special debuff to the target lasting ${3}s. Allies that hit the affected enemy will reduce the duration of all damage over time effects on themselves by 10% per hit while active. (${1}s cooldown)
descriptionHtml: Tripping a target applies a special debuff to the target lasting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font>. Allies that hit the affected enemy will reduce the duration of all damage over time effects on themselves by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">10%</font> per hit while active. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${1}s cooldown)</font>

name: You've Got Flail
description:
Hitting weakened targets with trip will inflict ${15}% rend for ${5}s on the target, and granting ${15}%  fortify on self for ${5}s.
	

(Rend decreases armor) 
	
(Fortify increases armor)
descriptionHtml:
Hitting weakened targets with trip will inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}% rend</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font> on the target, and granting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">fortify</font> on self for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>.
	

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Rend decreases armor)</font> 
	
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor)</font>

name: Destabilize
description: Adds a follow up heavy attack, that deals ${145}% weapon damage.
descriptionHtml: Adds a follow up heavy attack, that deals ${145}% weapon damage.

name: Warding Bludgeon
description:
Perform a spinning leap then swing the flail down to strike targets, dealing ${100}% weapon damage.
	

While leaping, trigger a burst of energy, granting a reinforced fortify to self and all allies within 3m of player, increasing armor by ${50}% for ${8}s or until ${3} hits are taken. 
	

This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
	

Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your Flail, this ability inflicts taunt for ${8}s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
descriptionHtml: Perform a spinning leap then swing the flail down to strike targets, dealing ${100}% weapon damage. While leaping, trigger a burst of energy, granting a reinforced fortify to self and all allies within 3m of player, increasing armor by ${50}% for ${8}s or until ${3} hits are taken. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your Flail, this ability inflicts taunt for ${8}s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

name: Stable Impairment
description:
Stamina damage taken is reduced by ${25}% for ${0.5}s after activating block. 

Additionally, blocking hits while the reinforced fortify from Warding Bludgeon is active will Inflict a stack of  Impairment for ${6}s on the attacker, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second and weakening them, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks)
descriptionHtml: Stamina damage taken is reduced by ${25}% for ${0.5}s after activating block. Additionally, blocking hits while the reinforced fortify from Warding Bludgeon is active will Inflict a stack of Impairment for ${6}s on the attacker, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second and weakening them, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks)

name: Best Friends
description:
Upon hitting a enemy target, a nearby ally within ${6}m is selected and you become linked to them. While the connection is active, they gain empower, increasing their base damage by ${15}%, and you both gain damage absorption, reducing damage taken by ${10}% for ${8}s, or until players are more than ${6}m apart from each other.

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)
descriptionHtml:
Upon hitting a enemy target, a nearby ally within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${6}m</font> is selected and you become linked to them. While the connection is active, they gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">empower</font>, increasing their base damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}%</font>, and you both gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">damage absorption</font>, reducing damage taken by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${8}s</font>, or until players are more than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${6}m</font> apart from each other.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)</font>

name: Vital Suppressant
description:
While at or above ${50}% health, reduce damage taken by ${4}%.
	

While below ${50}% health, reduce the attackers stamina damage dealt while blocking by ${10}%.
descriptionHtml:
While at or above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> health, reduce damage taken by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${4}%</font>.
	

While below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> health, reduce the attackers stamina damage dealt while blocking by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>.

name: Cured Flailment
description: The first target hit with a heavy attack within ${3}s of using an ability will cleanse ${1} stack of any debuff from self, and will also inflict a stack of Impairment for ${6}s to the target hit, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second and weakening them, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks)
descriptionHtml: The first target hit with a heavy attack within ${3}s of using an ability will cleanse ${1} stack of any debuff from self, and will also inflict a stack of Impairment for ${6}s to the target hit, dealing ${10}% weapon damage per second and weakening them, reducing their base damage by ${10}%. (Max ${3} stacks)

name: Reductive Superiority
description:
Grants status effect duration modifications on self based on what shield type is equipped:
	

 Round Shield - Increased base duration of all limited duration buffs on player by ${10}%
	
 Kite Shield - Decrease base duration of damage over time and debilitating effects on player by ${10}% 
	
 Tower Shield - Decrease base duration of crowd control effects on player by ${10}%
descriptionHtml:
Grants status effect duration modifications on self based on what <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">shield type</font> is equipped:
	

 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Round Shield</font> - Increased base duration of all limited duration buffs on player by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>
	
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Kite Shield</font> - Decrease base duration of damage over time and debilitating effects on player by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font> 
	
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Tower Shield</font> - Decrease base duration of crowd control effects on player by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${10}%</font>

name: Flail Mary
description: While stamina is at or below ${30}%, activating an ability will grant ${15} stamina. (${5}s cooldown)
descriptionHtml: While stamina is at or below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${30}%</font>, activating an ability will grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${15}</font> stamina. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(${5}s cooldown)</font>

name: Mitigated Protection
description:
When blocking a hit, gain a ${3}s tracking status effect, every blocked hit extends the duration of the status effect by ${3}s to a max of ${9}s, and while the effect is active, gain variable damage absorption based on current health percent and equip load:
	

 Heavy - 5% absorption at full health increasing to a max of ${20}% mitigation as health decreases
	
 Medium - 3% absorption at full health increasing to a max of ${13}% mitigation as health decreases
	
 Light - 1% absorption at full health increasing to a max of ${7.000000000000001}% mitigation as health decreases
descriptionHtml:
When blocking a hit, gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font> tracking status effect, every blocked hit extends the duration of the status effect by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${3}s</font> to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${9}s</font>, and while the effect is active, gain variable damage absorption based on current health percent and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">equip load</font>:
	

 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Heavy</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">5%</font> absorption at full health increasing to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${20}%</font> mitigation as health decreases
	
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Medium</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">3%</font> absorption at full health increasing to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${13}%</font> mitigation as health decreases
	
 <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">Light</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">1%</font> absorption at full health increasing to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${7.000000000000001}%</font> mitigation as health decreases

name: Reinforced Vitality
description:
Increase your max health by ${25}% of your physical armor rating while the flail is equipped.

(This effect is active as long as the flail is equipped, even if the flail is sheathed)
descriptionHtml:
Increase your max health by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${25}%</font> of your physical armor rating while the flail is equipped.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect is active as long as the flail is equipped, even if the flail is sheathed)</font>

name: Human Shield
description:
Hitting a target with an ability while within ${6}m of an ally, applies a status effect linking yourself and a single ally to each other for ${5}s. While the effect is active the ally will only take ${50}% of the incoming damage and causing you to inherit ${35}% of the incoming damage they didn't take. 
	

(Cannot be applied to targets that already have this effect, or self if you already have the effect applied to an ally)
descriptionHtml:
Hitting a target with an <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">ability</font> while within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${6}m</font> of an ally, applies a status effect linking yourself and a single ally to each other for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${5}s</font>. While the effect is active the ally will only take <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${50}%</font> of the incoming damage and causing you to inherit <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f" class="fw-semi-bold">${35}%</font> of the incoming damage they didn't take. 
	

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cannot be applied to targets that already have this effect, or self if you already have the effect applied to an ally)</font>
